direccion: Avenida 9 de Octubre 414 y Garcia Moreno, Guayaquil 090150 Ecuador
descripcion: Oro Verde Guayaquil, Member of Worldhotels offers an exquisite combination of European experience and Ecuadorian hospitality. Our full-service, downtown hotel offers the ultimate in sophistication and comfort for business and leisure travelers alike. Our hotel's superb location in the Guayaquil commercial and financial district means you are within walking distance of popular tourist attractions, entertainment and shopping as well as cultural and historical sites. The hotel is also just a quick eight-minute drive from the airport and offers complimentary transfers.

comentarios.p_comentario: La verdad el servicio y el trato es excelente. Nos trataron de maravilla a mi y al equipo de ingenieros. Me gusta mucho que las instalaciones y los horarios se adaptan perfecto a los horarios de trabajo delequipo, además, la limpieza y staff fueron agradables y de ayuda.

Soy de Argentina en este lugar tiene un buen servicio, buena acogida y un lugar agradable y ameno. Estuve en algunos lugares turísticos de guayaquil,  me encanto y me parece muy increíble la ciudad y es maravillosa

Fabiola is the queen of massage!! Her hands are incredible. They go from tender to strong at all the right times……42 years of experience!!!  She is a sweet humble woman who loves her job.  Hellen was so helpful and courteous. She keeps guests on schedule. We had a lovely conversation.  Nelson rescued me from going on the wrong elevator.

Nos gusto mucho el hotel por la comida el servicio sobretodo en la piscina sumamente atentos es un espacio muy bonito. La gente es muy cálida y se siente el ambiente familiar, seguro volveremos!! Gracias oro verde

estare siempre muy agradecida por el gran trato que hemos recibido en su hotel. Quisiera mencionar en especial a Jonathan Ruiz, al sr Diego, a Jose trelles y a Carlos Gomez. 4 excelentes personas que tiene este hotel que son super serviciales y no saben lo mucho lo que les agradezco cualquier pregunta o ayuda que les haya pedido. Gracias mil Gracias. son de un gran valor agregado al Oro Verde. se les aprecia mucho y no los olvidaremos desde Curacao un gran saludo para todos uds.  su desayuno tabien excelente!!! gracias.

Fue una muy agradable estadía, las personas que nos atendieron son muy amables y atentas, gracias Steven por las recomendaciones, disfruté mucho cada lugar, sigan así!  Gracias y espero volver pronto ☺️

Su ambiente es pacifico, ademas están ubicados de todas las actividades de mi viaje, Diego del personal de recepción atendió mis problemas de una manera efectiva y rápida además me recomendó lugares que no conocía como por ejemplo Guayarte o el Parque histórico, me recomendó visitar el Capwell lo cual agradezco y Recomendaría la experiencia.

La habitación impecable, el personal súper amable, el desayuno delicioso y el pan de chocolate el mejor del mundo!!  En su visita a Guayaquil recomendado visitar este hotel, además su ubicación es estratégica…………………………………………………………,….

Excelente ubicación en el centro de la ciudad me facilitó el poder conocer esta bella ciudad, me recogieron a tiempo en el transfer del hotel y gracias a Diego de recepción pude tener una idea clara de los lugares donde podría ir a disfrutar de la gastronomía ecuatoriana a parte del restaurante del hotel que me dejó muh impresionado con la variedad que hay en el menú. Disfruté mucho mi estadía y espero volver muy pronto.

La pasé muy bien en la piscina con mi familia el desayuno estuvo delicioso el servicio de spa es muy bueno. La habitación fue muy bonita nos sentimso como en casa. Lo recomiendo sobretodo para pasar en familia

direccion: Clemente Ballén 406 y Chile, Guayaquil 090303 Ecuador
descripcion: See why so many travelers make Unipark by Oro Verde Hotels their hotel of choice when visiting Guayaquil. Providing an ideal mix of value, comfort and convenience, it offers a family-friendly setting with an array of amenities designed for travelers like you.Close to some of Guayaquil's most popular landmarks, such as Iglesia San Francisco (0.2 mi) and Captain Morgan's Pirate Ship (0.2 mi), Unipark by Oro Verde Hotels is a great destination for tourists.Unipark by Oro Verde Hotels is a family-friendly hotel offering a flat screen TV and air conditioning in the rooms, and it is easy to stay connected during your stay as free wifi is offered to guests.The hotel features a 24 hour front desk, a concierge, and room service. Plus, guests can enjoy a fitness center and a lounge, which have made this a popular choice among travelers visiting Guayaquil. For guests with a vehicle, free parking is available.While in Guayaquil be sure to experience local shrimp favorites at La Canoa, Caracol Azul, or Picanteria La Culata.Guayaquil is also known for some great gardens, including Botanical Garden of Guayaquil, Parque Seminario, and Jardines del Malecón Simón Bolíva, which are not too far from Unipark by Oro Verde Hotels.At Unipark by Oro Verde Hotels, your comfort and satisfaction come first, and they look forward to welcoming you to Guayaquil.

comentarios.p_comentario: Das Hotel ist toll gelegen - nicht zu weit von der Promenade. Ein sehr großes Frühstücksbuffet mit jeglicher nationaler und internationaler Essensauswahl. Die Zimmer und das Bad sind absolut sauber und werden täglich gereinigt.   Der Service ist sehr gut, insbesondere Cesar und Mauricio. Die beiden sind sehr hilfsbereit und informieren sehr gut über jegliche Belange und Nachfragen. Darüber hinaus sind beide sehr vertrauenswürdig und machen ihre Arbeit echt gewissenhaft. Selten so einen zuverlässigen Service erlebt!

Excelente la atención de mercy pintos la mejor del mundo ; todo muy limpio siempre atenta a mis necesidades La verdad que fue una experiencia inolvidable muchas gracias mercy pinto  Me la llevaría a mi casa por qué mi mujer es un desastre

Tienen unas instalaciones espectaculares, el trato del personal pues a la par de todo, un ambiente inigualable, sus colaboradores Mauricio y César excelente en su trabajo, muy atentos a cualquier necesidad, 100% recomendado

Lo mejor de hospedarse en Guayaquil es Unipark hotel, linda vista en las habitaciones y sobretodo gente de calidad, Erika Vera en recepción y Jean Pierre Flores en botones se lucieron muy agradecido por todo

Un hotel increíble con una atención impecable todas las personas que allí trabajan son muy amables me atendieron en el Hall unos  hombres muy amables que estuvieron  siempre atentos ... Es un lugar al que encantada volvería  Muchas gracias Cesar y Mauricio

Gracias Unipark por su espectacular acogida con mi familia de corazon les agradezco mi familia la paso espectacular seguro y siempre los recomendare gracias Erika por darnos Buenos consejos de viajeros y rutina de lugares gastronomical pero. Ninguno como Unipark

Gracias unipark no había podido escribirles por mi trabajo mi ocupación ya tres semana que estuve allá y me encantó Guayaquil y más que todo la Hospitalidad de la recepción sobre todo Erika me conseguía taxi seguro me guiaba me recomendaba su restaurant la verdad encantando de Unipark se los recomiendo lo mejor

Siempre me hospedó en unipark y todo cada día es mejor, lindas habitaciones, comida exquisita, el chef destaca tanto en sabor y en servicio mi querida Erika Vera no deja siempre de resaltar junto con Carlos en botones siempre pendientes de mi estadía, recomendado al 100

Mauricio y Cesar fueron muy amables y me ayudaron con todo que necesitaba. La recepción también fueron muy amables. Solo la gente del breakfast buffet ningúna persona de ahí me atendió terrible servicio de ellos especialmente las meseras.

Las habitaciones son  espaciosas y limpias, las comida ni se diga, buenísima , sirven un buen desayuno y en la cena me consienten; pero sobre todo el excelente servicio de todo el personal, son muy amables y atentos especialmente el sr Cesar Arriaga

direccion: Calle Numa Pompilio Llona s/n Ciudad del Rio - Puerto Santa Ana, Guayaquil 090303 Ecuador
descripcion: Located 4.8 Km (3 miles) away from Jose Joaquin de Olmedo International Airport, right next to the majestic Guayas River. The historical Santa Ana Hill and its famous Lighthouse, the amazing Malecon 2000 and the traditional Barrio Las Penas, are within a few minutes walking distance. It features a rooftop swimming pool, spa and a fitness center equipped with jacuzzis, steam bath, sauna and gym. Buffet breakfast is served daily at Rio Grande restaurant where you can enjoy a memorable river view.

comentarios.p_comentario: Fui a Numa Bar a ver la final de la Copa Libertadores. El ambiente fue increíble, perfecto para partidos o eventos deportivos. La atención de George fue 100/10. Si siguen promocionando más eventos así de seguro volveré!

Uno de los hoteles más caros de Guayaquil con pésima atención. Se suspendió el servicio de agua caliente por dos dias (  22 y 23 de octubre ) y no fueron capaces de avisar al momento del check in sabiendo ya que estaban sin agua caliente . No  dan una solución . Pésima atención a los huéspedes .

Excelente en todo, atención, instalaciones, comida, sector, seguridad. El personal es muy amable, respetuoso y trata con calidez a los clientes. EL desayuno es muy bueno, por todas las opciones que permiten elegir.

El restaurante es espectacular, la comida deliciosa, la atención fue excelente por parte de Moisés, y todo acompañado de una buena música de fondo, te hacen sentir una velada inolvidable. Definitivamente un lugar para volver.

Hotel con una calidad en servicio, limpieza, estancia, amabilidad del personal, RECOMENDABLE sin lugar a dudas. Por poner una excusa, involuntaria del personal que te recomienda a los taxistas, son de poco fiar, se aprovenchan de la carrera cobrando precio altos, Pero el hotel no tiene nada que ver, si me gustaría que informaran al personal del taxi que cuiden a los clientes como en el propio hotel nos cuidaron.

Quiero agradecer y felicitar por la honestidad de los colaboradores del hotel, Dejé olvidado mi Apple Watch y aún cuando pasó un mes, me lo entregaron :)  . La ubicación del hotel es perfecta, ya que tiene varios lugares a su alrededor para distraerse! La habitación es impecable y la atención al cliente es excelente!! Somos clientes fieles :) gracias

Me hospede con mi familia para el feriado de Octubre y dsifrutamos mucho del Hotel habitacion la comida y por supuesto la parte del Puerto Santana y el malecon y sus alrededores, definitivamente el mejor hotel de ese sector

Excellent hotel on the banks of the river, staff very friendly, efficient and helpful, free shuttle service from and to airport. Room overlooking the river was large, clean and very comfortable. Really enjoyed our stay.

Fantastically clean and decadent, from the moment I called to make the reservation Ashley was absolutely kind and made everything possible to make my stay with y'all the most amazing I've had in a hotel in Guayaquil, and I've been to a couple. Thank y'all for the amazing service and diligence, specially Ashley! Wonderful experience. I'll be back.  Todo espectacular, increíble servicio, es más, desde que llamé a hacer la reserva la atención de Ashley fue brillante! Me ayudó de la manera más diligente y fue precisa en sus soluciones. El botones fue un caballero, usé el servicio de bar también y quedé maravillado. Todo excelente, pero la atención de Ashley fue la guinda del pastel, en lo que fue una estancia maravillosa, que tendrá un lugar importante en mi memoria. Volveré!

This hotel has the best staff, great security all around and very clean! Good area for bars and restaurants as well! Staff is top-notch! Views of the river were a good vibe! The beds were a little worn but still slept great.

direccion: Avenida Gral. Francisco Bolona 503A Av. Gral. Francisco Boloña 503A y Calle Jorge Insua Hindro, Guayaquil 090510 Ecuador
descripcion: Situated on the north side of Guayaquil with quick access to shopping, medical offices and the airport, Radisson Hotel Guayaquil offers an ideal location for business travelers and vacationers. Take our free airport shuttle to the hotel, where you can refresh with a workout in our fitness center or a swim in the outdoor pool. Tour nearby Las Peñas and the art galleries at Santa Ana Hill, and then return for dining at our on-site Mangle Restaurant.

comentarios.p_comentario: La atención es súper cálida, habitaciones  confortables y limpias, el lugar el muy bonito y está en una buena ubicación, el personal muy amable y saben guiarnos, y la comida deliciosa en cada uno de sus servicios.

I have stayed at many different hotel properties in Guayaquil. This by far was the best experience of them all. The staff here are extremely kind and helpful. They really go out of their way to make sure you have absolutely everything you need. Especially Christopher who works in the restaurant. Being vegetarian, it can sometimes be difficult to find food in Guayaquil, Christopher made that process seamless for me and was so kind on top of it all. I will continue to stay at the Radisson during my future visits to Guayaquil. They also have airport transportation, major win!  Highly recommend this hotel over and above the “luxury” hotels in Guayaquil.

Excelente sitio, bastante acogedor. Karina del counter es muy atenta  Me hospedaje dos noches y tuve toda la ayuda del personal para mi comodidad, servicio habitation, solicitudes personalizadas, parqueo.

Excelente atención en recepción por Karina Cevallos. La comida buena. Habitaciones súper acogedoras. Recomiendo mas variedad en licores.  Habitaciones limpias. Buena predisposición del personal en el restaurante.

excelente servicio, todo muy limpio duermo como en casa .  siempre es un placer volver al hotel radison.  siempre hay galletitas para mis hijos  gracias por brindarme una grata estadia con mi familia.

Nos encantó muchísimo todo el lugar, muy lindo todo y la piscina estuvo rica, desayuno muy fresco, habitaciones amplias y buen lugar para pasar en familia con instalaciones modernas y limpias, además de varios servicios ☺️

Un hotel muy cómodo. Bien ubicado. Con todas las comodidades. Me gustó mucho. La comida quizás deba mejorar un poco más. Pero la atención de los trabajadores es muy buena, son realmente atentos y mantienen las medidas de bioseguridad.

Excelente opción para negocios o placer es un hotel a la altura de los mejores de la región, excelente atención, habitaciones muy bien mantenidas el desayuno buffet es muy variado y muy sabroso, opción realmente recomendada en Guayaquil

La experiencia muy bonita tiene una excelente atención todo es muy ordenado y limpio la comida expectacular, la atención y hospitalidad a todo momento es muy buena siempre están atentos para resolver cualquier inquietud

Todo el personal tiene un excelente servicio, las instalaciones muy buenas, el servicio de restaurante es muy bueno. Recomendado para pasar un fin de semana en pareja. El hotel está ubicado en una buena zona

nombre_id: Grand Hotel Guayaquil, Ascend Hotel Collection
direccion: Boyaca 1615 y Clemente Ballen, Guayaquil 090307 Ecuador
descripcion: Experience the local flavor of the tropical gateway to lush Pacific beaches and the beautiful volcanic Galápagos Islands when you stay at the one-of-a-kind Grand Hotel Guayaquil, an Ascend Hotel Collection® Member.

comentarios.nombreh_id: Grand Hotel Guayaquil, Ascend Hotel Collection
comentarios.p_comentario: Disfrutamos de ricos platos a la carta, con motivo de mi cumpleaños . El ambiente y atención de parte del personal de la Pepa de Oro fueron muy atentos, amables y diligentes, muchas gracias Maria gracia, José y Ronald por brindarnos momento muy ameno. Tambien agradezco el gesto del postre por mi cumpleaños :)

comentarios.nombreh_id: Grand Hotel Guayaquil, Ascend Hotel Collection
comentarios.p_comentario: Good central located hotel with swimming pool, it actually backs on to the cathedral in Parque Seminario. Breakfast could be a little better in selections. TV football is on if you need to catch a game, rooms a little dated but adequate for short stay.

comentarios.nombreh_id: Grand Hotel Guayaquil, Ascend Hotel Collection
comentarios.p_comentario: Desde la recepción todo estuvo muy bien, cuarto muy limpio, comida excelente y un excepcional servicio al cliente…. Me trataron de maravilla!!!! Volvería a repetirlo en mi próximo viaje a Guayaquil.  👍

comentarios.nombreh_id: Grand Hotel Guayaquil, Ascend Hotel Collection
comentarios.p_comentario: Nice room, good service. Terrible street facing location for that price. WiFi only started working just before my departure.   Free breakfast was ok. Coffee ran out an hour before breakfast was over  Clean room, many pillows, very fresh linens and towel and soap amenities. The bed is incredibly hard.   Delightful staff throughout. Try to be aware of whether your room faces the cathedral or the streets.

comentarios.nombreh_id: Grand Hotel Guayaquil, Ascend Hotel Collection
comentarios.p_comentario: Gran experiencia en mi estadía, hotel de primera, excelente servicio y atención. Personal perfectamente uniformado y con mucha educación. La ubicación detrás de la Catedral es perfecta. Deliciosos desayunos!!

comentarios.nombreh_id: Grand Hotel Guayaquil, Ascend Hotel Collection
comentarios.p_comentario: Excelente  atención,  creo  que para los  usuarios  que  tenemos  beneficios  empresariales,  se  podría extender  a  beneficios  familiares, es  decir  nos  gustaría  compartir  con la familia de  una estancia  en el hotel  con  el mismo  beneficio, para lo cual  su  registro  de  profesionales  que  usamos la instalaciones  de hotel podría permitirnos utilizar las instalaciones con el mismo  beneficio,  lo cual es  beneficioso  para las dos partes. Este  beneficio podría  aplicarse  mientras  el profesional  presta su  servicios  a la institución con la cual  tiene  el convenio.  De  seguro se  generan  clientes permanentes  en el transcurso del tiempo. Atte. Elvis Buitrón.

comentarios.nombreh_id: Grand Hotel Guayaquil, Ascend Hotel Collection
comentarios.p_comentario: Bei rechtzeitiger Buchung erhält man ein sehr gutes Preis/Leistungsverhältnis. Sehr sauber, sehr freundliche Mitarbeiter, Valet-Parking. Das Frühstück ist kräftig südamerikanisch, der europäische Teil (Käse, Schinken etc) eher schlicht.

comentarios.nombreh_id: Grand Hotel Guayaquil, Ascend Hotel Collection
comentarios.p_comentario: Habitaciones renovadas, cómodas, ubicado en el centro de la ciudad, buena atención, rica comida, buenas recomendaciones de seguridad en la ciudad por parte de recepción. Agilidad en el checkin y en el checkout.

comentarios.nombreh_id: Grand Hotel Guayaquil, Ascend Hotel Collection
comentarios.p_comentario: Siempre EXCELENTE...!! En todo sentido, 30 años disfrutando de este maravilloso hotel....solo una observación: la ultima vez me faltó el tradicional "coctelito de bienvenida".... no quisiera volver a sentirme "no bienvenido"...

comentarios.nombreh_id: Grand Hotel Guayaquil, Ascend Hotel Collection
comentarios.p_comentario: Hermoso, muyyyy buen servicio,  exquisita sazón del chef en cocina-restaurant de primera.  Hermoso ambiente de piscina, con un entorno natural verde y arte en una iguana preciosa gigante. Un recontra completo gimnasio, y spa.  Lo disfruté plenamente.  La habitación hermosa !!!  El baño muy bonito, una camotota para mí sólito, una ventana hermética que no deja entrar el ruido exterior,

direccion: Ave. de Las américas Junto al Aeropuerto Internacional, Guayaquil 090150 Ecuador
descripcion: Up scale full service property opened in July 2013 to cater corporate and leisure travelers lodging needs. Our service staff will extreme their efforts to always better serve you the Ecuadorian way.

comentarios.p_comentario: Excelente opción para quedarse lo mas cerca del aeropuerto, tienen un buen desayuno, están bien ubicados, tienen servicio de transporte en su propio bus al aeropuerto, el personal del hotel es muy amable, las habitaciones y el baño son amplios.

Es un excelente hotel en Guayaquil. Cada detalle muy bien cuidado por su impecable personal, que hacen todo lo posible para que tengas una estancia extraordinaria.  Debo resaltar la comida del restaurante ya que sirven platos dignos de cualquier restaurante de primera en la ciudad.  Súper recomendado!!

Estancia muy confortable, me llama la atención la limpieza y comodidad de sus habitaciones el servicio de parqueadero para vehículos el tiempo que duró mi viaje fuera del país facilita y genera tranquilidad, más su proximidad con el aeropuerto.

Super recomendado, excelente hotel, muy cerca al aeropuerto, personal muy amable, habitaciones muy cómodas, excelente vista, muy recomendado para negocios, turismo o en pareja. Además  el personal brinda información adecuada e importante al momento de salir

Stayed at this hotel after arriving back from a galapgos cruise.  What a beautiful hotel!  I have stayed at many IHG properties but this surpassed them all in design and - more importantly- service.  From checkin to checkout the staff exceeded expectations.  Our Spanish is almost non-existent but the front desk staff was wonderful in helping us when needed.  We were greeted with a welcome drink of punch at checkin.  Our rooms (610 and 609) were large and everything looked new.  Since we are Ihg members  our rooms were upgraded. There were always numerous employees waiting to help in the lobby.  We had dinner at the restaurant- waited about an hour for the food- that was the only thing that surprised us-   A bit slow. Food was fine and fresh.  Breakfast the next morning was buffet style- plenty of options to choose from.  We had lunch ordered up to the pool- that came in 30 minutes, which was fine.  Free shuttle back and forth to airport.  We used the lobby computer to print out our airline boarding passes.  Security guard always at entrance to hotel.  Checkout quick and easy.  5 minutes to airport by shuttle-can easily walk it.  Nice pool- shaded by 1 pm so if you want sun you  have to go there in the morning.  Can’t say enough good things about this hotel!…

Excellent location - you can basically walk from the airport to the hotel. Excellent customer service - the welcoming and greeting crew were fantastic. Excellent room - clean and very comfortable. Excellent breakfast - great variety and great staff. Can’t recommend this hotel enough!

Overnight stay. Literally steps to the airport.  Rooms were big and clean.  On site restaurant was good.  On our way back through, had a hiccup with some paperwork with our flights and the hotel was kind enough to help us get that sorted even though we weren't staying there on our way back as we were just connecting.  Will definitely stay with them in the future.

We stayed at the hotel twice for the convenient airport location and airport shuttle that made late arrivals and early morning flights convenient and less of a hassle.   On a late arrival flight it took about  half an hour from leaving aircraft to getting to our room this included getting our bags, meeting the shuttle and checking in.  Half an hour after a long flight to get a much needed shower and comfortable bed is awesome.   Staff at every interaction was efficient and really attentive.  In particular, Allison at the front desk and Freddy in the restaurant went the extra mile to be helpful.   Breakfast was ample with plenty of choice (Ecuadorian, European and North American options) served buffet style.  Lunch of Ecuadorian specialties was really good and service was attentive.  We stayed in the Sky Club floor .  This includes access to a club where you can get breakfast  - can opt for breakfast at main restaurant too - snacks and beverages all day and a happy hour with hot snacks and finger foods  in the evening.   But the star was the room.  Spacious  room and bathroom.  Comfortable bed and overall a very relaxing feeling of space and airy-ness.  The airport is a short 5 minute walk but would recommend using the available hotel shuttle.  Convenience for late arriving flights and early Galapagos flight departures  made this hotel a perfect choice.  Everything else described here made our stays really nice.  Would stay here again for the convenience, location and superior service and excellent rooms.…

This Holiday Inn is truly an oasis! It is located at the entrance of the Airport and it is shinny, clean and excellently run. The shuttle runs ever thirty minutes but if you come in and its a nice day and you don't mind a short walk as you come in-between their pick up times.  it is  an easy walk. The rooms are big and bath rooms very nice. The staff speaks excellent English and will arrange a safe talkie for you.

Arrived after 1AM and had flight to Galapagos at 12PM the next day. Emailed hotel prior and they had the shuttle driver outside waiting. Its only 2 minutes away from airport, but didn't have to walk with kids at that late hour. Shower was amazing, large walk-in with torrential rain water pressure. For a bit more, got a rate that included breakfast buffet. Good selection with omelet station. All staff from doormen to buffet were very nice. I recommend as high a floor as possible though, there was some street noise on the 3rd floor. I'd stay here again without hesitation

direccion: Malecon Simon Bolivar Avenue, Guayaquil 090313 Ecuador
descripcion: Located in Guayaquil, in front of Malecon 2000, River Garden Hotel + Suites provides accommodation with a restaurant, free private parking, a fitness centre and a bar. Featuring family rooms, this property also provides guests with a terrace. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, a concierge service and organising tours for guests. At the hotel, each room is equipped with a wardrobe. At River Garden Hotel + Suites each room comes with a desk and a private bathroom. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a continental or a buffet breakfast. River Garden Hotel + Suites offers a hot tub. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Saint Francis Church, Artisan Market Guayaquil and Botanical Garden. The nearest airport is José Joaquín de Olmedo International, 4 km from River Garden Hotel + Suites. The hotel offers in-out airport transportation as long as you request in advance.

comentarios.p_comentario: Gran Ubicación, amabilidad y comodidad volvería a hospedarme allí de regresar a Guayaquil.  Su personal fue muy amable, el desayuno con una gran variedad de opciones y su ubicación sin duda es lo mejor del River Garden, al frente del malecón a tres calles de las peñas y del teleférico

Nothing wrong with the accommodation or location and we were only there one night. The roof terrace was closed for a private event. Breakfast cannot be before 7am so we arranged for a lunch  box to take away instead- it was one sandwich, an apple and a carton of juice.

Tucked away at the top of an apart-hotel tower block (just ask at ground floor reception) this bar has a great view, and we had a couple of cold beers and a club sandwich.  The food took a long time to arrive, but we weren’t in a rush.  They have big screens for sports and other events and it looks as if it would be very popular for these.  Would certainly return.

After nearly three weeks in Perù, Ecuador and The Galápagos Islands our final stop was the River Garden Hotel, Guayaquil. Ecuador's largest city, that is literally at sea level, was a welcome break from the breathless heights of Cusco and Quito.   The hotel itself is very unassuming from ground level. With a convenience store in one corner and a fabulous biscuit shop in another, the hotel has the appearance of any other high rise in the face paced city environment. Only when looking up can you sea the striking hotel sign, if you are supple enough - my neck has definitely benefitted from those yoga tutorials.   Inside the hotel can compete with most of the hundreds of hotels that I have stayed in. The reception area, located on the eighteenth (18th) floor, flows seamlessly into an outdoor infinity pool, jacuzzi and bar area - this really is as good as it gets. I felt like I was in a scene from the Hangover and Paul Giamatti was going to appear before inviting me for breakfast.   The hotel room felt new, was large with two double beds, had a fabulous shower room with a rain head shower big enough to get two wet concurrently. And, had a window that framed the most fantastic view. The hotel was the perfect way to end our tour of South-West America.   The restaurant shares the fabulous views of the river and city and was surprisingly priced, in a good way - the food was excellent.   Being in the city the hotel is ideally placed for visiting all that Guayaquil has to offer. A perfect journey's end.   …

Practically a new hotel.  Super clean, awesome staff who are attentive and helpful.  Lovely views and the pool deck and bar in the 18th. floor are very inviting.  Enjoyed the Sunday Buffet when we were there.  Large selection and reasonably priced.  Highly recommend this hotel when your in the area.

We spent one night at this fine establishment. We had a great room with a Riverview. The floor to ceiling windows were great.  The room had all the amenities we needed and was very comfortable.  The breakfast which was included was excellent.  We enjoyed the poolside bar on the roof.  The staff was courteous helpful and efficient.  The property seem to be new.  We liked the location right on the Malecon.  This was an easy 5 star rating!

Good location. Great staff. A new hotel with good location. Food is excellent. Needed to get some suits and dress shirts pressed. Left at 1030am and they were back by 2pm the same day. A+ service. Rooms are very clean and good housekeeping. Will be back again.

Staff was so very friendly and helpful. The restaurant food was pretty good as well. Room was really nice, my only issue was that they perfumed the bed linens and it didn't smell good and made it hard to sleep because of the stink.

My daughter and I stayed for almost two weeks at the fantastic River Garden Hotel in Guayaquil, Ecuador.  It was the perfect stay. My daughter was very comfortable working remotely from our grand suite room overlooking the tranquillity of the Guayas River.  The personal at the hotel were so so polite and always with a smile on their faces, they really are very welcoming staff. The general Manager Mr. Morejon and his team were always making sure the guest feels at home! The reservation team, Eric, Evelyn, Lysette,Marcos, the housekeeping team, the security team..they are all the best.    I would start my mornings with a good early hour walk going on the Malecon heading North to the right of the stairs that head up to the hill called Cerro Santa Ana, and the street name is  Numa Pompilio LLona, a beautiful cobblestone winding road with colonial wooden houses along the way, then you meet Puerto Santana where you see the  modern buildings facing the river.  Then I would head south toward the end of the Malecon and then head back to the hotel.  Breakfast at the hotel was so convenient and we enjoyed very much the fresh juices at the buffet. The area where the hotel is located is known for the Museo del Cacao and all the restaurants in the area are open from 8 AM to about 4 to 6 PM  So lunches or early dinners were just very convenient because its right across the street.  From local ecuadorian restaurants to italian,  like Sfoglia, mexican Taqueria La Dona, El colibre cafe etc ... a lot to discover.  I must share too that for my relaxation time after breakfast I enjoyed just sitting at the bar looking at the ripples of the river, very peaceful...    Looking forward to staying again at the River Garden!!…

A clean, comfortable, attractive hotel with super helpful staff. Fun sky deck and bar with pool and not-so-hot tub.   Great location! Pedestrian streets with outdoor cafes. On the strip across from malecón 2000 - probably the only thing nice about Guayaquil. The area is safe with plenty of visible security personnel.  Although sparsely decorated, my room a wonderful city view. It was beautiful at night.  During the day, I could see the all the ugly, dilapidated  buildings in town.  Guayaquil is a big, lain American city with not that’s worthwhile. This hotel is probably the nicest and is where to stay.

direccion: Av Juan Tanca Marengo y Abel Romero Castillo Plaza Del Sol, Guayaquil 090505 Ecuador
descripcion: The hotel is located only 3 minutes from the Jose Joaquin de Olmedo Airport and a few steps from Mall del Sol Shopping Center, the biggest mall in the city. This hotel has modern accommodations in the main commercial and financial area of Guayaquil. It features a health club, free WIFI and free parking for all guests. Rooms at Wyndham Garden Guayaquil are nicely decorated and furnished with comfortable beds and feathered pillows. They come equipped with air conditioning, flat screen TV, coffee machine and a work desk. Room service is available 24/7. Wellness facilities include a sauna, jacuzzi and a gym. Our restaurant offers a healthy breakfast everyday, and sit-down lunch and dinner. National and international dishes can be ordered for dinner, accompanied with a selection of delicious wines.

comentarios.p_comentario: Lugar con excelente ubicación. Cerca de centros comerciales y aeropuerto. Staff excelente, atentos al servicio y dispuestos a ayudar. Cómodas habitaciones super bien equipadas. Restaurantes excelentes.

Se ubica muy cerca del aeropuerto y tienen servicio del hotel hacia el aeropuerto cada hora, el personal muy amable y dispuesto a atender. La habitación muy agradable, bien iluminada y funcional. La comida está bien, únicamente que el restaurante abre un poco tarde (7:30)

Un hotel de primera en el servicio de hospedaje, observo mucho orden y cuidado la habitaciones están bien organizadas y con una limpieza de confianza Esta ubicado en una zona de alto movimiento y segura por lo que no tienes problemas en caminar

Muy buen hotel,  buena ubicación, limpieza muy buena, el menú del restaurante un poco limitado, y  el único problema que percibí  fue el ruido exterior que ingresa a la habitación , se recomienda insonorizarlas habitaciones para un mejor descanso

- Excelente Hotel. Ubicado a solo 5 minutos del Aeropuerto y en una zona moderna y segura de Guayaquil. Disponen de recogida y traslado al Aeropuerto gratuito. - Previo a mi llegada pude comunicarme con el Hotel de una forma rápida y fluida. - El personal de recepción y el señor que me ayudó a llevar la maleta hasta mi habitación el día domingo 18 de septiembre por la tarde, me recibieron con mucho cariño, fueron muy amables y serviciales. Les agradezco el trato que me dispensaron. Tuvieron un precioso detalle, trayéndome una porción de tarta de bienvenida hasta la habitación. Gracias. - La habitación excepcional. Super amplia, la cama muy grande y cómoda. Punto de luz y enchufe cerca de la cama, multitud de enchufes en la habitación, escritorio muy amplio con silla, espejo de cuerpo entero, zona de armario y caja fuerte. Televisión con canales por cable y cafetera. Un ventanal enorme por el que entraba mucha luz. El Aire Acondicionado funcionaba a la perfección. Botella de agua de cortesía y minibar de pago. Cuenta con servicio de habitaciones. - El baño excepcional. Magnífica ducha con agua caliente y mucha presión, toallas, secador, y enseres en el baño: champú, gel, acondicionador y loción corporal. - El resto de instalaciones a la altura de lo anteriormente mencionado. Cuenta con gimnasio, sauna y destaco el maravilloso jacuzzi de la planta 1. Todo ello con toallas a disposición de los huéspedes y baño. - Maravilloso desayuno buffet. - Destaco la limpieza tanto de las instalaciones como de la habitación.  Ojalá tenga la oportunidad de volver! Gracias por hacer mi estancia maravillosa!…

Me gusto mucho la experiencia en el hotel. Personal amable habitación cómoda y excelente ubicación desayuno buffet súper bueno. En el último piso tiene un rooftop con una vista inigualable además de comida súper buena y excelentes cócteles se la pasa genial

Falta mantenimiento, las instalaciones están deterioradas, sería recomendable dar un seguimiento al proceso de mantenimiento. Falta señalética para ir al restaurant en el último piso, que si bien es agradable y bonita la vista, la carta variada pero las salsas de los espaguetis no muy recomendada. La ubicación del hotel es buena, tienes alternativas para salir, el mall esta cerca.

Habitaciones muy ruidosas, ventanas con poco aislamiento, cortinas dejan pasar toda la luz, imposible dormir bien, mucho ruido y mucha luz en la habitación. Excelente servicio lavandería. Personal muy amable.

El hotel se encuentra situado en una zona muy comercial y bonita en frente tiene al mall del sol. La atencion es muy buena la recepción con el recibimiento de Leonardo fue muy atento y servicial. Las habitaciones son muy confortables.

Buen hotel, cómodo desayuno buffet bien completo como para comer bien y salir a trabajar o a recorrer la ciudad. Tiene un rooftop que se llama Magnolia comida y bebidas súper buenas recomendado. El personal amable y a las órdenes. Habitaciones cómodas bien cuidadas el hotel se ve muy bien

direccion: Ave. Francisco De Orellana Mz. 111, Guayaquil 904662 Ecuador
descripcion: Elegance, comfort, security and personalized service are just some of the characteristics that make Hilton Colon Guayaquil, a real five-star city resort hotel. The splendid building is located only five minutes away from Jose Joaquin de Olmedo International Airport and dominates the city's new booming commercial and financial zone in Ecuador. Our hotel is surrounded by the main shopping centers and offers easy access to the downtown district area. Hilton Colon Guayaquil Hotel Features: 294 fully renovated rooms, Five restaurants and two bars, Room service available 24-hours, Business center, Refurbished meeting rooms, congress, and convention facilities with capacity up to 1800 people, Renovated outdoor pool and fitness area with a health spa. Travel should take you places.

comentarios.p_comentario: This is a big hotel with lots of restaurants, lovely architecture, convenient to the airport, helpful staff and an airport shiuttle. What's not to like?  1. It's very loud hosting large parties starting at 1 am and going all night long. This happened on the night we arrived, then on our return trip from Galapagos.  2. They have a beautiful pool and spa area, but good luck using it. We saw an endless parade of card-carrying locals visiting the pool and taking up most of the area. I don't blame the locals--I'd use the pool, too, if I lived there. As guests, just be aware of this.  3. Restaurants have limited hours.  Keep in mind, they will often close between meals.  4. My biggest complaint is the bait and switch on prices. If you look at the website the price per basic room is 103 USD. We were charged 250 USD both days. $50 is purely added on taxes.  To sum it up, if you want to sleep, this is not the place to be.…

We visited this hotel twice, before and after Galápagos Islands trip All we can say that it was AMAZING!!! Right from check in with Mr Ricardo Vallejo, who was extremely quick, efficient and very helpful. He was also very resourceful and later helped us with transportation, restaurant selection and also for Covid testing . He is a very caring and nice person. The hotel lobby, elevators, pool, and rooms were very modern, large and above all extremely clean. We had a higher floor both times, and near to the elevator, and found them to be very silent and comfortable  The rooms have refrigerator and coffee maker  The breakfast was out of this world, fresh vegetables juices, and a lot of different types of breads, yoghurt, muesli and a 100 different things  The hotel is very near to the airport, we used their shuttle, which was on time every time  Hotel is also centrally located, and we used Uber to go to a few restaurants  Overall, would highly recommend this place to anyone and everyone visiting Guayaquil  Cheers…

Sugerencia para el área de restaurante: los jugos siempre son DEMASIADO dulces, deberían ser naturales y si el huesped o invitado desea ponerle más azúcar. Hoy asistí a un desayuno y realmente no se pudo disfrutar del jugo porque era casi almíbar

Celebramos nuestro aniversario teniamos pensado viajar pero por tener un familiar delicado de salud decidimos quedarnos. Pero es nuestra costumbre celebrarlo todos los años.Decidimos ir al Hilton  por el fin de semana y no nos equivocamos.Nos recibieron maravillosamente nuestra habitacion decorada con petalos con un botella y frutillas con chocolate. La cena fabulosa , desayuno delicioso, almuerzo con un gran variedad de platos. Y todo todo el personal de todas las areas muy ambles con saludo y siempre  una sonrisa.Hasta notamos que todo el staff es muy contento y debe ser por tener un buen ambiente laboral. Que si regresaremos ??? Claro que si lo haremos. Un abrazo, Hildamaria Vargas Acunzo de Buendia

The quality of service of the Hilton Colon is one that should be used as an example company wide. The staff, from Management to the crew that maintains and upkeeps the rooms, surpasses all expectations. Bolivar, being a manager, to the crews at the front desk, to all of their attentive concierge gentlemen, Carlos, Alberto, John, Eduardo, Arnold, Kevin, Ricardo, William and others, help welcome you to the hotel. The bar staff, Cesar, Emanuel, Romario, Marlon, Rolando and their Sushi master, Alfredo, make a world of difference. Even room service, Carla, Tomas and Gregor. And their breakfast staff is awesome! Thank you for upholding service and making sure that one feels as if one is home.

Me encantaron las instalaciones, el trato con el cliente y la limpieza. Sin embargo, existe discriminación por parte de los guardias hacia el cliente (la calidad de la persona no se mide por el auto).

Me encanto, una mini vacación, un escape en mitad de la ciudad. El servicio es excelente por cada miembro del equipo en todas las áreas. Habitaciones lindas y limpias, camas cómodas. El desayuno el mejor. El area de la piscina y jacuzzi perfectas para un descanso.

We stayed here the night before our flight home. It was clean and comfortable. We enjoyed the pool area and swim up bar. I got a massage at the spa and it was one of the best massages I have ever had. We ate dinner at the steakhouse in the hotel and it was very good as well.

I have asked for a quiet room...I don't know if they did it on purpose, but they just gave me a room facing the noisy street in front. Room was moist and stinky, very bad aeration. Good breakfast. Instead, only the bar in the lobby to have dinner (the other restaurant was blocked by some dinner concerts-too costly).

Thank you Hilton Guayaquil for such a wonderful experience.  Hopefully your beds get upgrated to Queen size. That's my only complaint.  I was told they did not have Queen size beds on the Hilton chain??? But that's not the case in the US.

direccion: Av. Francisco De Orellana 236, Guayaquil 090150 Ecuador

comentarios.p_comentario: Un hotel muy seguro, limpio y con excelente servicio. Tanto en recepción, room services, comedor y ayuda en sistemas de información fueron muy atentos y serviciales. Además el servicio de transportación (taxis del hotel) excelente. Victor y su equipo fueron siempre puntuales, respetuosos y sobre todo su excelencia en sus servicios.  altamente recomendado.

Again, this is a favorite resting spot on my journeys. There have been many cosmetic improvements since my previous stay (pre-pandemic), but the staff has maintained their quality and attentiveness. Jorge Buchel (GM) and Kevin Velasquez (Front Office) run a tight ship. They have ensured that ALL staff are responsive and focused on Marriott quality. This hotel is a gem! Any traveler will be well received and accommodated at this jewel of a Marriott. Happy stay!

A group of colleagues and doctoral college students stayed for a whole week at the Courtyard Guayaquil for an international congress. We felt at home, safe, and pampered. Their service was outstanding.  Also, their Taxi company called Amador tour and Grupo AT Taxi Seguro was the cherry on top. Those drivers are highly professional, knowledgeable, respectful, and responsible… they make you feel at home… safe! A group member lost her phone in one of their cars (Pepe’s Car… the best), and he found it, returned to the hotel, and gave it back to the owner. Nowadays, this kind of Taxi driver are very hard to find… they are  GOLD, and they complement the excellent experience our group had at the hotel.

For a Courtyard Marriott International, and the price you pay to stay at hotels like it, you are expecting a standard to be followed. My partner and I found our bathroom not cleaned and with no shower or hand towels. Had she not been a Bonvoy Member, we most likely may have not received any. There is a relatively small pool for a 16 floor building, on the roof. The staff is friendly, and the location is next to the San Marino Mall, which is ideal for shopping. There is a delicious 5/5 restaurant in the lobby called the Novo.  Hoping our next visit is a much better experience.

Excellent service. Extraordinary attention from all the staff members.  The manager Kevin Velasquez was extremely helpful in every detail of my party as well as the party coordinator in the hotel. I am deeply thankful for the way my entire family and friends were treated not just at the hotel but as well at the night of my birthday party.  Esther C

We had the best possible stay at the Guayaquil Courtyard. Our trip was a mixed family and business trip, and having been less than satisfied lately with our previous go-to hotel in Guayaquil, we decided to give this one a try, and are very happy we did. We spend a lot of time at the hotel and can say the rooms were comfortable, the food is good, the staff is friendly and accommodating, the rooftop pool and gym were useful to us and we have zero complaints.

Our room is on the 6th floor and the “Club/bar” is on the 5th floor right below our room.  Music is is so loud at the bar and doesn’t turn off until 3am. We can hear every word of every song. When your trying to get a peaceful nights rest this is not where you will find it!! We called the front desk and they could not move us and were not able to have the bar turn the music down.  Very disappointed that the Marriott would allow for a bar to play music that loud and keep their guests up all night!!  It’s one thing to have music blaring until 11pm but not until 3am!!  Unbelievable!! 👎🏼👎🏼

Was only here a night during my stopover transit in Guayaquil. They have a complimentary airport shuttle, room was great, good WiFi, good food. Very close to the airport. Didn't really get to explore anything in the hotel or nearby, but it seemed like a busy part of town

I stayed here for a family reunion. It is convenient and reliable. front desk people are very helpful, Andres was attentive. Rooms are good, wifi works good. Restaurant was amazing fresh juices, authentic food. Service was nice. Plenty of good choices within walking distance. Overall it surpassed my expectations. Highly Recommend.

Upon my arrival the hotel front desk staff welcomed me with a smile and was ready to assist me with the checking process, Jose front desk representative was very profesional with my check out and helpful. Daniela from the restaurant staff was very nice always ready to provided guidelines with the menu and a beautiful smile.  Thank you Courtyard by Marriott in Guayaquil, Ecuador

direccion: Ave. de Las américas Junto al Aeropuerto Internacional, Guayaquil 090150 Ecuador
descripcion: Up scale full service property opened in July 2013 to cater corporate and leisure travelers lodging needs. Our service staff will extreme their efforts to always better serve you the Ecuadorian way.

comentarios.p_comentario: Excelente opción para quedarse lo mas cerca del aeropuerto, tienen un buen desayuno, están bien ubicados, tienen servicio de transporte en su propio bus al aeropuerto, el personal del hotel es muy amable, las habitaciones y el baño son amplios.

Es un excelente hotel en Guayaquil. Cada detalle muy bien cuidado por su impecable personal, que hacen todo lo posible para que tengas una estancia extraordinaria.  Debo resaltar la comida del restaurante ya que sirven platos dignos de cualquier restaurante de primera en la ciudad.  Súper recomendado!!

Estancia muy confortable, me llama la atención la limpieza y comodidad de sus habitaciones el servicio de parqueadero para vehículos el tiempo que duró mi viaje fuera del país facilita y genera tranquilidad, más su proximidad con el aeropuerto.

Super recomendado, excelente hotel, muy cerca al aeropuerto, personal muy amable, habitaciones muy cómodas, excelente vista, muy recomendado para negocios, turismo o en pareja. Además  el personal brinda información adecuada e importante al momento de salir

Stayed at this hotel after arriving back from a galapgos cruise.  What a beautiful hotel!  I have stayed at many IHG properties but this surpassed them all in design and - more importantly- service.  From checkin to checkout the staff exceeded expectations.  Our Spanish is almost non-existent but the front desk staff was wonderful in helping us when needed.  We were greeted with a welcome drink of punch at checkin.  Our rooms (610 and 609) were large and everything looked new.  Since we are Ihg members  our rooms were upgraded. There were always numerous employees waiting to help in the lobby.  We had dinner at the restaurant- waited about an hour for the food- that was the only thing that surprised us-   A bit slow. Food was fine and fresh.  Breakfast the next morning was buffet style- plenty of options to choose from.  We had lunch ordered up to the pool- that came in 30 minutes, which was fine.  Free shuttle back and forth to airport.  We used the lobby computer to print out our airline boarding passes.  Security guard always at entrance to hotel.  Checkout quick and easy.  5 minutes to airport by shuttle-can easily walk it.  Nice pool- shaded by 1 pm so if you want sun you  have to go there in the morning.  Can’t say enough good things about this hotel!…

Excellent location - you can basically walk from the airport to the hotel. Excellent customer service - the welcoming and greeting crew were fantastic. Excellent room - clean and very comfortable. Excellent breakfast - great variety and great staff. Can’t recommend this hotel enough!

Overnight stay. Literally steps to the airport.  Rooms were big and clean.  On site restaurant was good.  On our way back through, had a hiccup with some paperwork with our flights and the hotel was kind enough to help us get that sorted even though we weren't staying there on our way back as we were just connecting.  Will definitely stay with them in the future.

We stayed at the hotel twice for the convenient airport location and airport shuttle that made late arrivals and early morning flights convenient and less of a hassle.   On a late arrival flight it took about  half an hour from leaving aircraft to getting to our room this included getting our bags, meeting the shuttle and checking in.  Half an hour after a long flight to get a much needed shower and comfortable bed is awesome.   Staff at every interaction was efficient and really attentive.  In particular, Allison at the front desk and Freddy in the restaurant went the extra mile to be helpful.   Breakfast was ample with plenty of choice (Ecuadorian, European and North American options) served buffet style.  Lunch of Ecuadorian specialties was really good and service was attentive.  We stayed in the Sky Club floor .  This includes access to a club where you can get breakfast  - can opt for breakfast at main restaurant too - snacks and beverages all day and a happy hour with hot snacks and finger foods  in the evening.   But the star was the room.  Spacious  room and bathroom.  Comfortable bed and overall a very relaxing feeling of space and airy-ness.  The airport is a short 5 minute walk but would recommend using the available hotel shuttle.  Convenience for late arriving flights and early Galapagos flight departures  made this hotel a perfect choice.  Everything else described here made our stays really nice.  Would stay here again for the convenience, location and superior service and excellent rooms.…

This Holiday Inn is truly an oasis! It is located at the entrance of the Airport and it is shinny, clean and excellently run. The shuttle runs ever thirty minutes but if you come in and its a nice day and you don't mind a short walk as you come in-between their pick up times.  it is  an easy walk. The rooms are big and bath rooms very nice. The staff speaks excellent English and will arrange a safe talkie for you.

Arrived after 1AM and had flight to Galapagos at 12PM the next day. Emailed hotel prior and they had the shuttle driver outside waiting. Its only 2 minutes away from airport, but didn't have to walk with kids at that late hour. Shower was amazing, large walk-in with torrential rain water pressure. For a bit more, got a rate that included breakfast buffet. Good selection with omelet station. All staff from doormen to buffet were very nice. I recommend as high a floor as possible though, there was some street noise on the 3rd floor. I'd stay here again without hesitation

direccion: Avenue 33, Ciudadela la Garzota, Mz. 83, Solar 6 -9, Guayaquil 090513 Ecuador
descripcion: With its modern, and contemporary design, Hotel Puerto Pacifico offers the perfect base for a cool and comfortable visit in Guayaquil. Located next the José Joaquín de Olmedo Airport, and in the heart of the Guayaquil´s entertainment hub, this charming 48 room hotel gives you, the suitable spot for your way of friends, business, holiday or digital nomad visit. Welcome to our community.

comentarios.p_comentario: Nice hotel to stay overnight between flights. Close to airport. Friendly personel and transport to and from hotel were arranged on time. Food in restaurant was good, specially cheviche was really nice. Rooms were clean and nice. Overall experience was good.

This is our go-to place for Guayaquil. It's a smaller hotel, but very clean and organized. The staff is great, most speak good English (for those who need that service). It's super close to the airport in a quiet neighborhood. We've stayed in a regular double room and a bunk room and both were equally clean. Across the street is a van service to Cuenca, very convenient.

Located just next to the Alianza bus terminal. Very nice and comfortable rooms with lots of space. Good room service and nice breakfast. The staff is very friendly and helpful. Perfect for a short stay, for example before a flight to Galapagos.

I’ll preface this by saying this is a review booked from Agoda, your experience may vary. I have booked Agoda for myself, friends, and family many times, where it says taxes and fees included, and NEVER experienced a hotel saying “although your booking is paid, you still need to pay $13.90 before staying”. I asked for what and they said for taxes. They said stuff like “you see when go to another country, you have to pay taxes”. Very condescending. I’m pretty sure I’ve stayed in many more countries and hotels than that guy. We argued back and forth for 15 minutes about how it’s already paid for and in the end, I just said I’ll tell my credit card company or Agoda to fight the deceptive and false advertising charge. I’m not sure if Agoda messed up, or the hotel messed up supplying wrong information, but it ruined my stay. Upon asking Agoda to investigate, a CSR emailed me saying it was a 22% service charge for staying. What..? First it was taxes, now it’s a service charge… for staying at a hotel? What a joke.   Furthermore, the bottles for shampoo and conditioner don’t even fit cubby for the shower, so I have to put them on the floor. So to use the shampoo, you have to bend down and squirt it in your hand. Kind of laughable really… and to seal the deal, they don’t have a shuttle that was listed. They just call a taxi. Then when the taxi was dropping us off, they started asking and writing down our room number and name of booking. Never had a so called shuttle service ask information like that… sketchy. Stay far away. Oh, and by the way, yes, I got a refund for your deceptive charge from Agoda. Don’t stay here!…

Desayuno genial, cenamos también en el hotel y estuvo muy rico todo. La zona de la pileta y terraza muy linda. Destaco la predisposición del personal y la amabilidad. Muy lindas y cómodas las instalaciones. Superó nuestras expectativas.  Me encanta que sean pet friendly! Y tengan opciones de comida para las mascotas ! Excelente idea !

Hotel nuevo, bien mantenido. Personal de counter amable. Habitación limpia y cómoda, un poco ruidosa pero nada fuera de lo razonable.  Desayuno aceptable variedad y bien preparado.  Room service es bueno.

Un hotel cómodo, muy limpio en el que puedes disfrutar tu estadía en un lugar tranquilo y cerca de todo (aeropuerto, centros comerciales) es ideal para descansar de forma segura, con un buen desayuno y atención.

Excelente servicio y atención. El trato del personal es perfecto, y la comida es muy sabrosa.  Solo sugeririamos que hayan mas sillas de descanso en la terraza, ya que a veces suben varios grupos familiares.

Parecía más grande en el anuncio no hay suficiente agua, sin pasta, pero de ahí bien, en general si nos gustó el hotel y tal vez para el futuro tengamos otra salida. Ser puntuales en lo del piqueo más nada

Muy bien todo el hotel, solo la piscina no estaba funcionando. El desayuno completo, la atención del personal muy buena, las habitaciones estaban bastantes completas, limpias, bien equipadas y con todo lo necesario para una estadía.

direccion: Ave Constitucion Plaza Del Sol, Frente Al Mall Del Sol, Guayaquil 090150 Ecuador
descripcion: If you’re looking for a family-friendly hotel in Guayaquil, look no further than Sheraton Guayaquil Hotel.For those interested in checking out popular landmarks while visiting Guayaquil, Sheraton Guayaquil is located a short distance from El Castillo Chocolate Farm (1.9 mi) and El Faro de Guayaquil (2.0 mi).As your “home away from home,” the hotel rooms offer a flat screen TV, air conditioning, and a minibar, and getting online is easy, with free wifi available.Guests have access to a 24 hour front desk, room service, and newspaper while staying at Guayaquil Four Points. In addition, Guayaquil Sheraton offers a pool and an on-site restaurant, which will help make your Guayaquil trip additionally gratifying. And, as an added convenience, there is free parking available to guests.While in Guayaquil be sure to experience nearby diners such as Ville Crepes, Rock Sport Café, or Pollos De Boncho.Guayaquil is also home to Museo en Miniatura Guayaquil en la Historia, a popular military museum that is not too far from Four Points Guayaquil.The staff at Sheraton Guayaquil Hotel looks forward to serving you during your upcoming visit.

comentarios.p_comentario: Bad service very bad rooms dirty also personal not friendly price is very expensive for the room and amentitiess you get I thought because is a Sheraton I will have something good and nice but definitely not the case

We are currently staying at the Sheraton as part of a tour group, and also spent an additional night before meeting with our group. Our stay was off to a great start beginning with our arrival at the airport. I emailed the hotel a couple of days before arrival asking about the hotel’s airport shuttle and providing our flight information. Within a couple of hours I received an email acknowledging our information and providing location for pickup. Although the flight was scheduled to arrive at midnight, it was delayed by two hours. Even so, the driver was at the airport waiting with our name on a card. The room is clean and large with plenty of storage. In the bathroom there is a very nice walk-in shower. Directly across the street is a huge mall accessible by a walkway over the busy road out front of the hotel. There is a large food court with many choices for quick meals.…

This hotel is conveniently located next to a big shopping mall, only about 10 minutes from the airport. BTW, the hotel does provide a shutter to the airport. It's a little dated, but the customer service is great. The executive lounge provides beers and wines to the elite members and appetizers after 6:30 pm. I was fortunate to have Fernando serve/help me during my two-night stay. He paid attention to what I needed at the lounge and made my stay very enjoyable.

I spent  3 night in the hotel, very nice staff all around, but in particularly Fernando, he works at the executive lounge and really gave us a special service with a lot of motivation and always smiling. He really made a difference on my stay in the hotel.

The Sheraton Guayaquil is a very nice hotel, conveniently located across Mall del Sol.  The food at this hotel is very good and the staff is very friendly, respectful and offer great service, specially Fernando at the Executive Lounge, he's always anticipating your needs and willing to go an extra mile to make sure you are pleased and taken care of.  The only reason I don't give this hotel 5 stars is because the hallways and rooms need updating, other than that great place to stay.

Two great things at Sheraton Gyayaquil  - the lounge with Fernando at the helm was awesome  Fernando takes such diligent care of all the customers and even brought vegetarian options for me.  the 2nd thing is  location access to the mall across the street, it's perfect to walk there to the good court.  The only reason for 4 stars is they don't have a coffee machine in room.

Located in Ciudadela Kennedy across the street from Mall del Sol.  The staff is friendly and extremely helpful. I stayed there for 11 days and enjoyed it.  The rooms are average but clean and comfortable. The restaurant offers good food and great breakfast buffet.  I recommend the hotel get ice machines and put Kleenex holders in the rooms. Lots of restaurants and shopping near by.

Lo bueno: Un hotel con excelente ubicación justo frente al Mall del Sol, personal amable, excelente desayuno con amplia variedad, buena limpieza… Lo malo: Estacionamiento en el hotel es pequeño y con malos olores (usan otro estacionamiento más grande a una cuadra, lo que es algo incómodo) en mis dos ultimas vivitas, los colchones han sido muy incómodos, impidiendo un descanso reparador, algo impensable en un hotel de esta categoría.

The hotel has all the amenities, is very comfortable and their employees hospitality superb. Fernando from the Sheraton club on the 8th floor took good care of us during breakfast and dinner.  We will definitely stay at this hotel again, great overall experience.

Quise disfrutar de una buena bebida y no solo recibí eso, fu atendido cálidamente por su bartender Jesus Lucio, quien me hizo sentir como en casa tuvimos una muy buena plática mientras preparaba mis bebidas, es gratificante hacer un break y cerrar muy buenos negocios mientras se disfruta de una gran bebida!!!

direccion: Av Joaquin Orrantia, Guayaquil 090505 Ecuador
descripcion: Surrounded by dining and shopping in the heart of the business district, TRYP by Wyndham Guayaquil offers a free shuttle to Jose Joaquin de Olmedo Guayaquil Airport (GYE), just two miles away. Whether you’re visiting for work or leisure, you’ll appreciate free WiFi and parking, in addition to a pool, fitness center, and on-site dining at OLMEDO Gastro Bar. We’re connected to the biggest mall of the city and close to Guayaquil Convention Center which is less than a mile away. This non-smoking hotel is also close to the riverside Malecón 2000 where you’ll find the historic Torre Morisca clock tower. As your “home away from home,” the hotel rooms offer a flat screen TV, air conditioning, mini-fridge, and getting online is easy, with free wifi available. Guests have access to a 24 hour front desk, room service, and a concierge while staying at Safe Stay Certified hotel. At TRYP by Wyndham Guayaquil, your comfort and satisfaction come first, and they look forward to welcoming you to this great city.

comentarios.p_comentario: Una experiencia inmejorable, el lugar perfecto para una estadía placentera cómoda y descansada.  El lugar es muy agradable podemos visitar el Mall del Sol en el que encontramos muchos almacenes de buenos precios y buenos productos

Lindo hotel, excelente ubicación, servicios modernos, piscina, dormitorios bien amoblados, excelente atención en el restaurante, muy cordial, y la comida de excelente calidad para todos los gustos. Una excelente estadia

No tiene buena infraestructura,  tenían un evento que llegaba la bulla hasta las habitaciones del cuarto piso y todos los cuartos generamos reclamos, lograron detener la bulla a las 3am siendo los reclamos desde las 11pm de todas las habitaciones

Buena ubicación y servicios junto al Mall del Sol. No se requiere salir a otro lado porque tiene todo cerca excelente ubicación para el Aeropuerto y Terminal Terrestre desayuno buffet desde 06:30 am  excelente atención.

Lugar familiar con gran calidad de servicio, una carta con deliciosos platos para escoger y un buffett de desayuno muy variado y agradable para todas las edades. Gustosamente regresaría al hotel TRYP.

Gran Hotel, muy bien ubicado con comodidad y atención espectacular, recomendable, espero volver pronto, la facilidad de estar contiguo al mall del sol es un beneficio extra, mi habitación en especial muy cómoda

Es un gran hotel. Con muy buenas instalaciones, muy limpio, y gente muy cordial y profesional. Tienen además muy buena comida. Voy todos los meses por mi trabajo. Su ubicación es ideal. Es una gran facilidad el que cuenten con estacionamiento. Es muy seguro.

el hotel presenta buenas habitaciones y el establecimiento del lugar prresenta buena seguridad. cerca del centro comerial, y disponibilidad de transporte a cualquiier hora. buen lugar para vacacionar.

sin comentarios estoy de acuerdo con los servicios ofrecidos, en relacion costo vs beneficio, lo que si me gustaría es aplicar a una cuenta corporativa ya que la mayoría de mis viajes son por negocios

En pocas palabras, fui tratado como huésped de segunda categoría. Talvez al personal en la mesa de entrada ayudaría mucho una pequeña sonrisa en su rostros inexpresivo. La limpieza ni que hablar, tiene den la cas y sacan la basura como lo haría cualquier hospedaje municipal.

direccion: Avenida 9 de Octubre 1608 and Garcia Moreno, Guayaquil 090105 Ecuador
descripcion: The GH Galeria Hotel in Guayaquil has a total of 94 large rooms, all fully equipped and soundproofed. There are also two meeting rooms equipped with the latest audiovisual media, and a wide selection of comforts and services.

comentarios.p_comentario: A destacar, la amabilidad del personal, el front desk muy amable y dispuesto siempre a colaborar, el staff en el comedor muy educados, el hotel es bonito, como su nombre lo dice, quiere ser una especie de Galerìa de Arte y el concepto funciona bien. En las habitaciones hay cafetera y agua de cortesìa.  El aire acondicionado de las habitaciones viejo, por ende el ruido es terrible. El problema en mi caso fue el baño, el hotel ya no entrega amenities y en su defecto tiene dispensadores de jabòn y shampoo, en mi habitaciòn los dispensadores estaban demasiado duros y casi no salia jabòn, adicionalmente el otro dispensador estaba vacìo, eso quiere decir que no hay una revisiòn pre check in.  No se preocuparon en arreglar el problema, no me dieron opciones y todo quedò asì.    En fin es un buen hotel pero esos detalles hacen que uno por un precio similar pueda buscar otras opciones e ir a la fija con un buen producto en general.…

Hotel muy bien ubicado en una zona estrategica de la ciudad, nos toco una habitacion en el 5to piso que tuvimos algunos probelmas con el baño y la caja de seguridad pero enseguida los solucionaron sin problemas. Desde el recorrimos la ciudad caminando sin problemas, su personal nos ayudo siempre. Servian un desayuno muy variado, completo y rico

Se ha retirado como antes sí se ofrecía el desayuno y no se encuentra minibar, solo el refrigerador vacío. A la TV de cable tiene pocas opciones de canales TV.  Por lo demás la habitación es muy limpia y cama confortable. ¿Una cafetera sin café?

Eine Nacht in Guayaquil haben wir hier übernachtet. Das Zimmer war sauber und geräumig. Das Bad hatte eine Badewanne. Das Frühstück war landestypisch. Freundliches Personal!  Fazit: Schöner Aufenthalt, zentrumsnah und es geht auch schnell zum Flughafen!

Unser Aufenthalt im Hotel war okay. Das Personal war sehr freundlich. Unser Zimmer war grosszügig geschnitten, den kleinen Fitnessraum konnte man auch benutzen. Frühstück okay, das Rührei wurde frisch zubereitet. Was uns gestört hat, sind die schlecht isolierten Fenster: Wegen des Strassenlärms war es schon frühmorgens ziemlich laut im Zimmer. Die "Kunst", die sämtliche Hotelwände schmückt, fanden wir eher gewöhnungsbedürftig - das dürfte aber sehr individuell sein 😊

Booked as appeared to be in the centre, it was clean but found better and quieter value near to the river. Check-in took ages because they could not find the reservation. I did not find this good value for money for the city, or other places in Ecuador.

Es increíble! Que estando hospedado NO TENGAS DERECHO A UN PARQUEO LO DEBES PAGAR APARTE !!!!Según recepción si tienes suerte y hay parqueo podrás ingresar con tu auto sino pues es tu problema, debes solucionarlo por tu cuenta !!! Nunca más volveré! Pesima      atencion. NO LO RECOMENDARIA Ñ, Dice en el anuncio desayuno "gratis" eso es falso

I would highly recommend this hotel for the location, comfortable rooms, price and breakfast. It also had the 5 star Oro Verde hotel across the street to try their restaurants and bar. 20 min walk to Malecón and many food options within walking distance.

O hotel fica numa avenida central de Guayaquil, o hotel é moderno, grande com muitos quartos. Porém, retornamos de um passeio às 17h da tarde e o quarto ainda não tinha sido arrumado e após arrumado não repuseram o papel higiênico. O café da manhã é bem diversificado, com frutas, pães, ovos, salsichas...A partir das 19h funciona o restaurante do hotel, comida muito boa com preço justo.

Hotel ubicado en el centro de Guayaquil, frente al Hotel Oro Verde.  Tiene una tarifa competitiva para esta ciudad.  Logre una buena tarifa buena por internet, pero a mi llegada al Hotel me dijeron que tenia que pagar impuestos, que no habian sido cargados en el pago anticipado.  El personal muy amable.  La habitacion amplia pero algo ruidosa por el aire acondicionado.  Trate de apagar el A/C y no pude hacerlo.   Deben tener mas enchufes en las paredes, especialmente cerca del escritorio.

direccion: Malecon 606 y Manuel Antonio Luzarraga 593, Guayaquil 090306 Ecuador
descripcion: Overlooking the Jardines del Malecón and the Guayas river, the Hotel Ramada is centrally located in downtown Guayaquil. Free breakfast is included. Guests can enjoy the indoor pool, solarium, sauna and fitness center. Free WiFi is available. Rooms at the Hotel Ramada offer accommodation with air conditioning. All rooms feature cable TV and free Wi-Fi and some rooms have scenic river views. Guests at the Hotel Ramada can choose from 2 dining options. "El Malecon" restaurant serves local cuisine dishes while the Riva Delicatessen offers fresh sandwiches and pastries. The hotel is located only 5 km from José Joaquín de Olmedo International Airport‎, and within walking distance of local restaurants and nightlife. Airport shuttles can be arranged for an extra charge, and free parking on the street is provided.

comentarios.p_comentario: This was our first visit to Guayaquil and this hotel made it an excellent one. Room in excellent shape; clean, well decorated and excellent location The restaurant's food is excellent,  and the attentions can't be better. The people at the front desk were helpful and with good manners.
来泰安爬山，入住东尊华美达，环境不错，离泰山近，体会到了客房小吴的热情服务，主动介绍房间设施和登山信息及注意事项，给我们提供了很多帮助，非常感谢！

Really good hotel the staff are very helpful and friendly only downside is that the pool is a little too cold but apart from that everything is up to standard food is always nice with lots to choose from rooms are plenty big enough so really no complaints at all the fire show was really good

Great location but a crumby hotel. Absolutely lacked hospitality to the point of being uncomfortable. Overpriced car parking and everything will cost you something unlike the four star hotel a few blocks away. They inspect your room when your out without permission. Yes. The bathroom was old and needed at least a paint job. Let alone the plumbing and the incredibly bad pressure/heat shower you would expect at a $20 Hostel. Is it really a Ramada?

Hotel Ramada Review:  First, I would like to say that if I owned a hotel, I would be very happy with the staff we encountered at this site; they made the stay. As the hotel stands now, this hotel is a one night stay only for many reasons. Our reason for staying there was the location. On entry to the hotel, the road which you park on to enter is very dangerous with very fast moving traffic. We are under COVID restrictions, so we enter and we are treated with an alcohol spray and then moved forward to the reception. We made the reservation through  booking.com. So it went smoothly. A young man escorted us to our room, where he explained the keycard. We entered the room where he explained the function of the a/c remote, and left. The room had no resemblance to the photos on booking.com. The young man did not explain the alarm system or where we would need to go in an emergency? The room was old like me. The furniture was functional; just, we could not open and close the drawers, so we did not use them. The curtains looked like they were last washed just before they were hung. The closet did have a safe, but it was too small for the two of us so we did not use it. The bathroom- the floor was wet from a leaking hose, which if laid in the bathtub would have prevented the water leaking onto the floor. The towels were just a little younger than I am and we were missing one? Talking about the bathtub, there was paint peeling from around the tub and it was stained. The hand basin was cracked. Sad to see that they did not use bulk sized toilet paper, and the same for the shampoo and conditioner. The use of bulk in the bathroom is environmentally better. The room- both beds moved when sat on? Both beds did not have a bedside light? Both beds did not have a headboard so the pillows would fall down the end of the bed? The pillows- I have never seen such small pillows and found it impossible to sleep on them. Both bed pillows did not have pillow protectors, both mattresses did not have mattress protectors? The included Wyfy was ok @ 10mbps, the TV was ok, the selection of channels was fine. They did not do a bad job of reducing the noise from the road below. Breakfast was included, nice, well presented and good selection. However, the restaurant was well overpriced and very limited in selection. I would give the food a pass and go somewhere else. I understand that there is reconstruction going on in the hotel, but please do not do a bait and switch; the room we stayed in was nothing like the photos on the web site. More than one night here is too much.…

La ubicación del hotel, en frente del Malecón 2000, lo hace muy especial, pues ahí es donde se ubican importantes puntos turísticos: La Perla, cafeterías, el bus del city tour, el faro en el barrio la Peña; además, por su ubicación todo queda cerca: mercado de artesanías, iglesias, parque de las iguanas, tiendas, restaurantes, entre otros.

Recomendado para Charlas y Reuniones de Negocios, facilidades de espacios y la predisposición de dar facilidades a quienes necesitamos de un Ambiente tranquilo y cerca de la Zona comercial de Guayaquil!

El hotel necesita con urgencia una reforma. Es anticuado y deficiente en algunos servicios. En positivo la ubicacion y el tamaño de las habitaciones.  En negativo, el mobiliario, pintura, decoración pero sobre todo, el baño. La caja de seguridad de los años 70, en consonancia con el resto del hotel. Cierto que reformaron la primera planta, la que sale en algunas fotos, pero es mas cara y si vas poer agencia no te enteras. No hay seguridad privada en la puerta del hotel. El desayuno poco variado, muy justito. En la zona hay opciones mucho mejores.

Llegamos y al pagar nos dijeron que la habitación era ejecutiva, pero nos dieron una habitación antigua. Muy bueno el servicio, el buffet poco variado pero rico, ofrecían bolones y no había. Muy bueno

Es muy buen hotel, esta bien ubicado justo al frente del malecón y a unas cuadras de la bahía, nos atendieron muy bien fueron muy cordiales, la comida en el restaurante estuvo muy buena, también esta cerca del patio de comidas del malecón.

direccion: Cdla. Guayaquil, Calle Victor Hugo Sicouret y Emilio Soro Lenti Manzana 11, Villa 8, Guayaquil 090150 Ecuador
descripcion: Homely and cosy hostel with private rooms, close to the airport. Great for business travelers and transit passengers in Guayaquil's city, going to or comming from: Galapagos and any other part of the Country.

comentarios.p_comentario: I had to schedule a last-minute trip to Guayaquil (family matters). The owners couldn't arrange for my pick up from the airport, but they ensured I knew how to get safe at the hostel. They followed my flight (which arrived one hour late) and waited for me at the reception.  As the pictures show, the decoration is minimalist, but it has all the comfort of a hotel. I have spent the night in a Hilton, Hyatt, and Marriott, but believe me when I say Hostel Macaw has the most comfortable bed.  The next day, coffee, eggs, and fresh fruits. You can't beat that.  The hostel is a family-owned business. They keep everything clean and fresh and provide a shuttle from and to the airport. There is no TV in the bedrooms, and it is OK. They have excellent Wi-Fi instead.  My flight back was at 6:30 am. Rodrigo, the owner, gave me a little paper bag. A little something for the road. A juice and a sandwich. I can't thank enough for the A+ customer service Rodrigo and Fanny provided.…

Beliggende i relativt sikkert område tæt på lufthavnen. Der er et shoppingcenter tæt på, men ellers er der ret langt til turistområder. Fint hotel med alt det basale i orden. Langsomt wifi. Fin morgenmad. Meget venligt personale som taler engelsk.

I arrived in this beautiful hostal following a breakdown of the vehicle with which I was traveling throughout Latin America and I ended up staying there for more than a month, taking the opportunity to visit the Galapagos where the owner of the Macaw was driving for 40 years. They treated me more like a family member than a guest and I became friends with the whole family. For those passing through Guayaquil on the way to the Galapagos this is the ideal place to stay and the airport is just minutes from the door of the Macaw hostal.

Fantastisk sted og det sødeste par som arbejde oå hotellet - hotelværelset var fantastisk og sengen var kæmpe stor. En af vores overnatninger skulle vi tidligt afsted i lufthavnen, her stod de tidligt op for at lave en madpakke vi kunne få med i lufthavnen. Vi vil anbefale dette hotel til alle andre!

We loved our overnight in Guayaquil because of Fanny and the Macaw. This hostal is open and breezy, clean with a delicious breakfast.
