Fanny was super attentive to our needs, walked us to an amazing restaurant across the street and arranged for us to visit a hat factory during our short stay. We highly recommend the Macaw for long or short stays!

Aangenaam hoteletje opgericht met eigen handen door de eigenaar met zorg voor de natuur daar zij ontzettend veel hout gebruikten van de galapagos eilanden. Aangezien dit geen inheems hout was verstoorde dit het ecosysteem van de Galapagos.  Prachtig versierd met overblijfsels van kleurijke tegels die er de fauna van de omgeving afbeeld, vanwaar de naam Macaw (grote groene papagaai).  Aangenaam didactisch tuintje met tropische vruchten zoals de cacao (lekker is dit)  Kamers zijn eenvoudig maar funcioneel, relatief ruim met zeer goede douches (druk en warm water waren top). Mischien hebben niet alle kamers een buitenraam maar stoort niet daar men hier aleen blijft om te slapen. De sociale ruimtes zijn voldoende en aangenaam om niet op de kamer hoeven te verblijven.  Groot aantal kleine aangename locale restaurantjes in de buurt al waren er tamelijk veel niet open wegens sanitaire redenen.  De liggen is zeer dicht bij de luchthaven (5 minuten). Al is er niet veel te bezoeken is er wel een aangenaam parkje om de hoek en een groot aankoop centrum op 300 meter lopen.…

My wife and I stayed here for an evening during a 9-hr layover between flights. We were returning from the Galapagos to the United States and did not want to spend  9-hrs in the airport. A friend on Santa Cruz recommended Macaw and were very happy with the brief time we were there. We were told that we were the first visitors there since the pandemic began in March. We were greeted with some Tomato Tree juice and showed to a cozy room where we could rest our heads prior to a flight later in the day.   We didn't really venture out much because we were primarily there to rest our heads before a long full day of travel, but Rodrigo helped us order some take out pizza for dinner and took some time to show us the garden with various native plants. We had never had cacao nibs before and he even picked a fruit off the tree for us so we could try some. He was very kind and helped us get transportation to and from the airport...just what we needed prior to a red-eye flight and a long next day of travel. Thank you!…

The hostal is very clean and half way between the airport and downtown Guayaquil, both ways take 10 min. It is well equipped for one or two nights stay. We had one of the few rooms with windows to the street. The other rooms have small windows to the court yard. In the surroundings there are several restaurants and a big shopping mall with a food court.  It was interesting to chat with the owner who is a former guide in Galapagos. Don't miss the small park one street away. It is sponsored by the owner of the hostal.  Rooms are clean, breakfast with fresh fruit, cereals, toasts and eggs as you like. Staff is very friendly and helpful.

We hebben zowel op de heenweg als op de terugweg in dit kleine hotel verbleven. De kamers zijn prima en netjes, ontbijt is uitsekend en personeel zeer vriendelijk en behulpzaam. Er is buiten een kleine binneplaats waar je nog wat kunt zitten en kan genieten van een drankje Een prima hotel in een rustige buurt, met meerdere resturantjes in de omgeving

Fanny is the most gracious hostess. This family-run place will feel like your home. The rooms are comfortable and just enough for a sound sleep before your day of adventuring. The food that we enjoyed was delicious and plentiful. We had two breakfasts and one dinner. We had them launder some clothes for us, it was beautifully done and inexpensive. The family has two official Galopagos guides in it, so any questions that you might have can be answered. We dined one night at an Italian restaurant a quick stroll from the hostal.  Also, you are a quick walk to the mall, which has to be seen to be believed. If you are from the United States, imagine your local mall in the late 1980s-early 1990's when malls were at their peak. It's hopping. Most importantly, Fanny was our contact in Ecuador during the beginning of our trip, when the protests were occurring. Even though she had never met us, and we were up in Quito, she was active on WhatsApp helping us from afar. It was like I had a mother in-country. I hope to visit her again someday!…

direccion: Av. Circunvalacion Sur 209 Urdesa Central, Guayaquil 090150 Ecuador
descripcion: Located in Guayaquil, 12 km from Saint Francis Church, Luxva Hotel Boutique provides accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a tennis court. Among the facilities at this property are a 24-hour front desk and a concierge service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel features family rooms.

comentarios.p_comentario: Rooms are spacious and well appointed.  Beds are comfortable. The staff went above and beyond to meet every need . My husband suffered a serious illness while there and they could not have been more helpful, especially Denise, at the front desk   Pool and hot tub clean and lovely.  Soda, beer, wine and snacks and toiletries are available for purchase and Uber Eats available all the time. Free secured parking is available on the property.

This hotel is gorgeous, you walk through the gate and feel you've entered some very powerful persons compound. It feels more like that than it does a hotel(which is a good thing.). Guayaquil, though you'd never know it just driving around, is supposedly very dangerous (thus the armed guards and barbed wire outside of every chic business).  It's nice to stay in a place that feels safe given those circumstances.  The backyard area has soccer tennis, a pool, ping pong etc.  And I imagine when times are normal you can order drinks by the pool etc. Our rooms were amazing too.  Highly recommend this spot.

Muy buena ubicación. Sus instalaciones son muy bonitas, sus áreas comunes son grandes y cómodas.  Sus cuartos espaciosos y cómodos. El desayuno es completo y muy bueno. El personal muy amables y atentos.

El Hotel está cerca de todo y las instalaciones están en excelentes condiciones, el personal es muy amable. Las habitaciones son igual a las fotos que muestran. Sin duda regrearé en algún momento. 100% recomendado.

Our room in this hotel did not have a window to the outside, the reason foŕ only 4*.  Otherwise, the hotel grounds are nice with a pool.  The staff helpful.  The room was clean and modern, and we had the best shower yet in Ecuador.  The breakfast was pretty basic.

Llegué a este hotel por recomendación de un amigo. Estuve por dos días y me parece que la ubicación y la atención son excelentes. Esta cerca de toodo! Es muy tranquilo, linda vista en el área al aire libre. Muy recomendado.

Excelente servicio, habitaciones  amplias  y muy cómodas. Realice mi APO en este hotel y lo recomiendo para estadía largas. El personal muy atento a todos los requerimientos. Ubicación super conveniente y cerca de muchas opciones de restaurantes.

Estuvimos en Luxva Hotel Boutique en una circunstancia bastante especial, habíamos regresado al país del exterior y por las medidas obligatorias relacionadas con la emergencia del Covid tuvimos que pasar 14 días en un hotel.  Nuestra habitación era muy amplia y bonita, con un pequeño balcón que mira a un jardín lleno de árboles, donde podíamos disfrutar el delicioso viento que corre por las noches en esta época del año . El closet de la habitación era digno de un príncipe, todo forrado en madera y muy cómodo. El baño amplio y moderno.  El personal del hotel muy amable y dispuesto a ayudarnos en cada una de las distintas situaciones que se nos fueron presentando.  Es realmente un lujo de hotel, tanto en infraestructura como en detalles y en trato a los huéspedes.  Gracias a todos los que hacen Luxva Hotel Boutique hicieron muchísimo más llevadera una situación incómoda y difícil.…

Excelente servicio ! Lindas instalaciones, y mucha tranquilidad ! Cerca a Guayarte, buen lugar para comer en la noche, y un circuito al lado del Río para trotar en las mañanas ! Buen precio, y un desayuno básico pero muy rico !

El hotel es bastane cómodo, tranquilo y cerca de todo. Me gusto mucho la habitación, además cuenta con piscina y tiene restaurantes cerca. El personal es bastante amable y el precio es bueno en relación a la habitación.

direccion: Ciudadela Simon Bolivar Manzana 5, Villa 56, Guayaquil 090105 Ecuador
descripcion: DC Suites is an excellent choice for travelers visiting Guayaquil, offering a family-friendly environment alongside many helpful amenities designed to enhance your stay.While staying at DC Suites, visitors can check out Iglesia San Alejo (1.3 mi), which is a popular Guayaquil attraction.The rooms offer a flat screen TV and air conditioning, and getting online is possible, as free wifi is available, allowing you to rest and refresh with ease.Guests arriving by vehicle have access to free parking.If you’re looking for a steakhouse, consider a visit to La Tablita del Tartaro, which is not far from DC Suites.Guayaquil is also known for some great art museums, including Museum of Anthropology and Contemporary Art and Museo Antropológico y de Arte Contemporáneo, which are not too far from DC Suites.Enjoy your stay in Guayaquil!

comentarios.p_comentario: Nos alojamos en este hotel por su proximidad al aeropuerto (llegabamos tarde a Guayaquil) y su buena relación calidad-precio en base a diversas opiniones… la verdad es que no está mal… la habitación es amplia y bastante cómoda (era una triple), y el baño correcto… para el precio, más que suficiente. Permiten el pago con tarjeta de crédito, tienen wifi y una plaza de aparcamiento (aunque hay bastante en las inmediaciones). Es una opción correcta.

I stayed at DC aeropuerto for 8 nights, and I can not appreciate the employees and the host enough. Wonderful, nice and accomodating people. Place is centrally located near the airport. Safe and clean.

Hotel ideale se dovete avere l aeroporto comodo. È veramente molto vicino e per 5 dollari vi verranno a prendere se avete paura a camminare, visto che non è in una via molto popolata di sera. Le camere sono molto spaziose e il prezzo onesto. Reception h24 basta scrivergli su whatsapp o chiamarli.

This hotel is family owned and they work very hard to provide good service.  They will pick you up at midnight from the airport, and will take you there at 3 in the morning. I have stayed there 3 times, going to and coming from Cuenca.  The hotel is very clean, they take great pride in their business.  I will be going to Ecuador again, I prefer to fly into Guayaquil and will stay there again. They are only 5 mins from the airport, I communicate with them by Whatsapp, and they always answer immendiately. Incidentally, a very, very,  reliable transportation service is safetransportationecu@gmail.com operated by Nestor, to go up to Cuenca and back down again.

Had no choice but to book this place last minute when my connecting flight was cancelled in the middle of the night. Thankfully this place was open and I could get a room. The front desk staff was very nice, helpful and efficient. They arranged a taxi for me literally 6 hours later to catch a flight. The room was les than desirable though! Small, shabby old furniture, terrible mattress that was incredibly uncomfortable. The bathroom was tiny, shower and sink super basic old style but it looked clean. I didn't really have a choice in the middle of the night but I would definitely not stay here again. The only positive about the property was the convenient location just a few minutes from the airport, the price and the serviceable staff.

I had an overnight stay here when passing through on flights. Arriving at this accomodation was a welcome sight. Beautiful lobby, clean, lots of staff to help you. The room was extra clean, nice bathroom and a TV to unwind. i would stay here again.

La amabilidad de todo el staff quedó opacada con la falta de agua al momento de mi salida, sabían que salía a las 3:45 de la mañana y nadie se preocupo para desde las 2:30 estar pendientes de que la bomba de agua esté funcional. Por otro lado ofrecen el servicio de shuttle gratis pero no es 24 horas, si deben salir del hotel antes de las 6 am se debe cancelar por el servicio 5 usd

Closed distance to the airport. The staff picked you up at the airport at anytime, easy to find meeting point, quick response. The room was average near the airport hotel, however the area is not the best. They also kept our luggage which was very handy

Nach unserer langen Reise von Zürich nach Guayaquil über Quito, waren wir froh, als wir unsere Beine in einem nahe gelegenen Hotel vom Flughafen, etwas ausstrecken konnten. Doch das DC Suites hat sich als mehr entpuppt, als nur ein Mittel zum Zweck. Ganz klar, es ist echt nah am Flughafen gelegen und eignet sich deshalb perfekt um eine Nacht zu entspannen, bevor man wieder weiterfliegt. (In userem Falle nach Galapagos) Was aber noch dazu kommt: Es sind sehr schöne, saubere Zimmer mit bequemen Betten. Man wird kostenlos vom Flughafen abgeholt und wieder hingebracht. (Ausser es ist wirklich mitten in der Nacht, da bezahlt man 5 Dollar, was aber immernoch völlig okay ist). Ausserdem durften wir unser Gepäck 6 Tage lang im Hotel lagern, da wie nicht alles auf die Inseln mitnehmen wollten. Das hat uns dann dazu bewogen nochmals eine Nacht zu buchen, als wir dann von Galapagos wieder retour geflogen sind. Der Besitzer und auch die Angestellten sind äusserst hilfsbereit und sehr freundlich.  Ich empfehle das DC wärmstens weiter und würde auch jederzeit selbst wieder einen Besuch abstatten!…

Estuve en estos días en el hotel, por el valor que cobran no dan una botella de agua de cortesía, hay mucha bulla en el alrededor del hotel lo cual es algo medio complejo para poder descansar. Fue algo raro que me pregunten que si quería que me arreglen la habitación, lo cual debería ser a diario a mi forma de ver.

direccion: Luque 1107 y Pedro Moncayo, Guayaquil 090105 Ecuador
descripcion: Welcome to the Hotel Alexander, the place where you will enjoy comfortable rooms with air conditioning, cable TV, hot water, private bathroom (steam-jacuzzi) at a very affordable prices. We are in the center of Guayaquil, city considered as the main port of Ecuador, which makes it one of the biggest tourist attractions in the country. Besides being close to the most important sites of the city, the Hotel Alexander offers the tourist an excellent national and international attention, hospitality and human warmth to make you feel like home.

comentarios.p_comentario: precios comodos ,y  habitaciones limpias  esta  ubicado en el  centro  de Guayquil  se puede  movilizar a cualquier  lugar  en  cortas distancias, ideal para  visitar clientes y  realizar  negocios.  Recomendado  ,tienen una  sala  de computo  donde puedes trabajar

Hotel muy comodo, sobre todo tienen buenas tarifas. Además cuentan con un restaurante que no solo vende platos a la carta, sino atmbién almuerzos. Nos gusto también que nos quedo cerca de un minimarket, que fue ideal para nosotros porque como viajabamos con mi hijo pequeño tuve que comprar algunas cosas escenciales.

Mi experiencia fue muy buena. El personal en recepción siempre estuvo atento y fue  muy amable. Tienen buenas tarifas. Un precio comodo para unas habitaciones muy lindas, sobre todo con aires acondicionados optimos que son impresindible con el calor de Guayaquil. Me quedo cerca de todo. Pude hacer mis tramites. Y, además tuve un poco de tiempo que aproveche para visitar el parque centenario que esta a una cuadra. Lo recomiendo.

Abbiamo soggiornato ad agosto 2018, due notti in una quadrupla. Struttura vecchia maltenuta e sporca, a colazione servizio lento e assolutamente non professionale. Il prezzo non è alto, 20 dollari a notte per persona compresa la colazione ma l'hotel è situato in una zona per niente bella, dove la sporcizia regna sovrana. non fatevi ingannare dalle foto di presentazione! Sconsiglio vivamente questa struttura a meno che, non vogliate spendere poco.

One the best restaurants in Saranda to deliver proper sea food, we tried different restaurant which have been quite expensive but failed to deliver, Hotel Alexandria on the other hand had the hospitaly and the service of a proper turism hotel

The location is very convenient, right in the core of downtown Guayaquil.  Public transportation and taxis were very accessible around the hotel. Lots of things to do and see around the corner.  I liked that the hotel recently renovated their installations so the rooms are well equipped with air conditioner and hot water. The rooms were clean and comfortable. WiFi is complimentary and room rates include breakfast.  The staff were very friendly and offered great customer service.  The restaurant has a great selection of meals, the food was very tasty and affordable. I would definitely recommend this hotel if you are planning to visit Guayaquil.

La foto no corresponde a lo que es el hotel, difiere demasiado. Está mal ubicado. La habitación poco ventlada.  No reponen las toallas de manera aurtomática, cuando limpian la habitación. El desayuno no es bueno, el café es instantáneo y no expresso, además no es un desayuno variado. El restaurante no tiene variedad.

Lugar oscuro y mal ubicado. Por el precio está bien sólo si vas de paso y llegar a dormir nada más. El acceso es casi hasta peligroso, no lo recomiendo de noche. Sólo usar taxis formales. Se puede comer allí aunque no hay mucho para elegir. La gente es amable. El mayor problema son las instalaciones.

Es una hotel bastante limpio, atención puntual, la comida es de muy buena calidad. No tiene muchas comodidad adicionales. Es un excelente lugar para solamente dormir y pasar el resto del día recorriendo la ciudad por paseo o por negocios. Lo que se podría mejorar es que el aire acondicionado de la habitación es bastante ruidoso, y la atención de las recepcionistas podría ser más delicada.

Fuimos al hotel un grupo grande de 26 personas.  Todos fuimos tratados con respeto y excelencia.  El personal es muy amable y dispuesto a solucionar cualquier inconveniente. La limpieza es excelente y el. Servicio de restaurante muy bueno. Y económico.  Todo fue excelente.

direccion: Quisquis 305 and Rumichaca, Guayaquil 5934 Ecuador
descripcion: Guayaquil Hostel Suites Madrid-GALAPAGOS TOUR OPERATOR is located in the touristic, commercial; and financial system in the heart of Guayaquil downtown; we are strategically accessible to any area important to know, such as shopping malls and touristic sites (just like El Malecon 2000, Las Peñas, Iguana's Park... everything at a short walking distance). Guayaquil Hostel Suites Madrid is also a Tour Operator specialized in Galapagos Last Minute Cruises.We have the best rooms and trust us... we guarantee you a pleasant stay at Guayaquil Hostel Suites Madrid.

comentarios.p_comentario: the place is unique in is style' lovely and very helpfull host/owner, close to  a lot of things, not that far from the air port and have a nice and working place restaurant on the corner of the same building

This hostal, which is really like a hotel, exceeded my expectations.  I am surprised it doesn´t have a higher rating simply because of all the amenities that make a weary traveler feel at home.    It´s really a unique place, with lots of beautiful blue tiles throughout.  Reminds me of Morocco.  Rooms are spacious, AC works GREAT, plenty of hot water, and the most helpful people on staff I have encountered in months of travel.  Staff is always around cleaning...  But it was the amenities I appreciated most.  CNN on cable.  After being on the road for a couple of months, it was nice to fall asleep to an English TV station.  Also, an absolutely spotless kitchen with microwave and icy fridge.   And a computer station, though internet was spotty on their computers, wifi was good throughout.  And up on the top level are some nice blue tiled sinks and clothes line if you need to wash out some laundry.    It´s only a few blocks to the Malecon.  They will help with last minute cruises to the Galapagos, and the man at the front desk during the day speaks English.  He helped me locate a place to repair my broken camera.    If ever back in Guayaquil, I would definitely stay here again!…

Hôtel bien situé pour aller marcher sur le Malecon ( promenade aménagée au bord d’une rivière) et visiter le centre historique de Guayaquil.  Chambres assez petites mais propres. Terrasse permettant des petits rassemblements agréables sur la toiture. On doit remettre la clé de la chambre dès que nous sortons. Malheureusement, me suis aperçue qu’un montant d’argent assez substantiel avait disparu de mon porte-monnaie alors que nous étions sorties pour aller déjeuner.

Die Zimmer sind sehr sauber und großzügig geschnitten.  Der Gastgeber ist freundlich und hilfsbereit.  Die Lage ist sehr zentral.  Mit einer gewissen Lautstärke muss gerechnet werden, was aber an der Stadt liegt

I stayed here for 8 nights waiting for my flight home. The rooms are big enough, have a good airco, super good shower and really are spottles clean. It is a safe place right in the center of town. Very much recommended !

Really nice place to stay in Guayaquil. It has a cool rooftop terrace with a great kitchen and even computers for the guests. The rooms are nice, clean and comfortable. We highly recommend Hostal Suites Madrid! :)

Nice clean and big rooms, helpfull staff, located in the city centre close to all major atractions. When i did not want to eat out i could make my scrambled eggs in the kitchen on the roofterras. I had a superb time here and recommand everyone to book an accommadation here if you ever visit quayaquil. Ow yeah, great prices ;-)

L'hôtel est extrêmement bien situé pour un arrêt court à Guayaquil. Le lieu est vétuste et bruyant. Il y a bien une discothèque mais la musique s'arrête vers minuit, ce qui reste correct. Le personnel est serviable. La chambre est propre. Ce n'est pas un lieu de villégiature mais la ville elle-même ne s'y prête pas.

Hermoso lugar,muy acogedor, muy cerca del comercio y a unas 10 cuadras d3l malecon. Nos atendierom muy bien. Totalmente recomendaBL3.  Muy buen precio. Personal muy amabl3 Flexibilidad dehorario.         Hermoso

I stayed here for over two weeks and the staff were very helpful and friendly. The rooms are very clean and comfortable and the building has good facilities with a kitchen and a computer room, and there is even a terrace. The wifi is also good.

direccion: Avenue 33, Ciudadela la Garzota, Mz. 83, Solar 6 -9, Guayaquil 090513 Ecuador
descripcion: With its modern, and contemporary design, Hotel Puerto Pacifico offers the perfect base for a cool and comfortable visit in Guayaquil. Located next the José Joaquín de Olmedo Airport, and in the heart of the Guayaquil´s entertainment hub, this charming 48 room hotel gives you, the suitable spot for your way of friends, business, holiday or digital nomad visit. Welcome to our community.

comentarios.p_comentario: Nice hotel to stay overnight between flights. Close to airport. Friendly personel and transport to and from hotel were arranged on time. Food in restaurant was good, specially cheviche was really nice. Rooms were clean and nice. Overall experience was good.

This is our go-to place for Guayaquil. It's a smaller hotel, but very clean and organized. The staff is great, most speak good English (for those who need that service). It's super close to the airport in a quiet neighborhood. We've stayed in a regular double room and a bunk room and both were equally clean. Across the street is a van service to Cuenca, very convenient.

Located just next to the Alianza bus terminal. Very nice and comfortable rooms with lots of space. Good room service and nice breakfast. The staff is very friendly and helpful. Perfect for a short stay, for example before a flight to Galapagos.

I’ll preface this by saying this is a review booked from Agoda, your experience may vary. I have booked Agoda for myself, friends, and family many times, where it says taxes and fees included, and NEVER experienced a hotel saying “although your booking is paid, you still need to pay $13.90 before staying”. I asked for what and they said for taxes. They said stuff like “you see when go to another country, you have to pay taxes”. Very condescending. I’m pretty sure I’ve stayed in many more countries and hotels than that guy. We argued back and forth for 15 minutes about how it’s already paid for and in the end, I just said I’ll tell my credit card company or Agoda to fight the deceptive and false advertising charge. I’m not sure if Agoda messed up, or the hotel messed up supplying wrong information, but it ruined my stay. Upon asking Agoda to investigate, a CSR emailed me saying it was a 22% service charge for staying. What..? First it was taxes, now it’s a service charge… for staying at a hotel? What a joke.   Furthermore, the bottles for shampoo and conditioner don’t even fit cubby for the shower, so I have to put them on the floor. So to use the shampoo, you have to bend down and squirt it in your hand. Kind of laughable really… and to seal the deal, they don’t have a shuttle that was listed. They just call a taxi. Then when the taxi was dropping us off, they started asking and writing down our room number and name of booking. Never had a so called shuttle service ask information like that… sketchy. Stay far away. Oh, and by the way, yes, I got a refund for your deceptive charge from Agoda. Don’t stay here!…

Desayuno genial, cenamos también en el hotel y estuvo muy rico todo. La zona de la pileta y terraza muy linda. Destaco la predisposición del personal y la amabilidad. Muy lindas y cómodas las instalaciones. Superó nuestras expectativas.  Me encanta que sean pet friendly! Y tengan opciones de comida para las mascotas ! Excelente idea !

Hotel nuevo, bien mantenido. Personal de counter amable. Habitación limpia y cómoda, un poco ruidosa pero nada fuera de lo razonable.  Desayuno aceptable variedad y bien preparado.  Room service es bueno.

Un hotel cómodo, muy limpio en el que puedes disfrutar tu estadía en un lugar tranquilo y cerca de todo (aeropuerto, centros comerciales) es ideal para descansar de forma segura, con un buen desayuno y atención.

Excelente servicio y atención. El trato del personal es perfecto, y la comida es muy sabrosa.  Solo sugeririamos que hayan mas sillas de descanso en la terraza, ya que a veces suben varios grupos familiares.

Parecía más grande en el anuncio no hay suficiente agua, sin pasta, pero de ahí bien, en general si nos gustó el hotel y tal vez para el futuro tengamos otra salida. Ser puntuales en lo del piqueo más nada

Muy bien todo el hotel, solo la piscina no estaba funcionando. El desayuno completo, la atención del personal muy buena, las habitaciones estaban bastantes completas, limpias, bien equipadas y con todo lo necesario para una estadía.

direccion: Calle Luque 1001 y Pedro Moncayo, Guayaquil 090105 Ecuador
descripcion: See why so many travelers make Hotel Sander their hotel of choice when visiting Guayaquil. Providing an ideal mix of value, comfort and convenience, it offers a budget friendly setting with an array of amenities designed for travelers like you.Given the close proximity of popular landmarks, such as Iglesia San Francisco (0.5 mi) and Captain Morgan's Pirate Ship (0.7 mi), guests of Hotel Sander can easily experience some of Guayaquil's most well known attractions.Guest rooms offer amenities such as air conditioning and a desk, and guests can go online with wifi offered by the hotel.Hotel Sander features a 24 hour front desk, to help make your stay more enjoyable. The property also boasts an on-site restaurant. If you are driving to Hotel Sander, there is paid private parking available nearby.While in Guayaquil be sure to experience nearby seafood restaurants such as Caracol Azul, La Pata Gorda, or La Pata Gorda.Plus, during your trip, don't forget to check out an art gallery, such as Casa Marin.At Hotel Sander, your comfort and satisfaction come first, and they look forward to welcoming you to Guayaquil.

comentarios.p_comentario: Hotel centrico. Buena atencion. Personal atento. Habitacion limpia.vista a calle no molesto el ruido durante la noche. Cerca de catedral y parque. Aire acondicionado tv cable  tarjeta con sensor para encender luces al lado de la puerta. Puente de prevencion en la entrada. Gel antibacterial al lado del ascensor. Pc en la recepcion mas desconozco si estan en uso.

Todo impecable todo limpio muy bien todo y el servicio muy bueno tambien cuando pase la noche con mi bebe ese dia estaba lloviendo duro y ni un solo ruido se escuchaba dormimos super bien todo. Las señoritas muy amables en recepción

Was the second best hotel that I stayed in while in Guayaquil (I only stayed in two). The word I would use to describe this place is "meh" in that it has everything you would expect but still feels pretty run-down. It was also more expensive than other hotels that I stayed in which made my experience more disappointing. The best part about this place was the location as it was a block from the central plaza and a 10 minute walk from the Malecon (the city's main attraction). There  were also plenty of stores and restaurants within walking distance which was very convenient. All things considered, I wouldn't stay here again though.  Value For Money: ​3/5 ​Security: 3/5 ​ Location: 4/5 ​  Facilities: 3/5 Staff: 3/5 Cleanliness: 3/5

Me había hospedado el año anterior en el hotel, por la buena experiencia volví a hospedarme con mi pareja, y fue mejor todavía. La habitación cuenta con aire acondicionado, agua caliente, TV con cable (pocos canales eso sí). La limpieza es bastante buena, reconociendo que sea diaria, completa, y dejando siempre jabón y champú. La recepción fue muy amable con nosotros, muy atentos a cuando salíamos, apoyándonos si se necesitaba taxi (por ejemplo).  Lo único que sí podría mejorar, es el WiFi, debido a que no mantiene suficiente estabilidad de conexión cuando hay muchos huéspedes, pero realmente no es un problema mayor.

If you are looking for an amazing hotel then for 20dollars you arnt going to get the standards you expect. YOU GET WHAT YOU PAY FOR!!   My boyfriend and I stayed here one night before our Galapagos trip and one night after if we were here longer we would have stayed at hotel Sander longer!   The staff are excellent, the WiFi is great (only in the lobby) the rooms are everything You want bed bathroom, air con yes here is nothing fancy on the walls but for 20 dollars we thought it was AMAZING!   We did have windows in our room 2 in fact (again you get what you pay for) so the cheaper the room the less you get ?   It was a bit noisy at night as we were right next to the main road but it didn’t stop us getting to sleep   All in all this hotel is great for 1 or 2 nights maybe ever more. The hotel staff even checked us in early from our early flight at 7am which was even better. I would highly recommend this hotel. …

Buen hotel, la atencion my buena, wifi aceptable. Las habitaciones tienen aire acondicionado y las camas son confortables. El agua caliente fue un problema, pero daba para bañarse sin problemas. La ubicacion es buena, esta a 8 cuadras de la costanera del rio, donde hay una rueda gigante y diversas atracciones.

El precio bien, la habitación acorde al precio, me cambiaron de habitación por que se olvidaron de limpiar la mía, sin embargo solucionaron el problema, estuvo bien!! El lugar es céntrico está muy cerca de el malecón, de los museos,etc.

Nous avons réservé une chambre matrimoniale !!  Malheureusement les photos ne sont pas à jour, nous avons du nous contenter d’une chambre basic au première étage donnant directement sur le trottoir plus que glauque...  Insécurité dans le quartier le soir !! La nuit n’en parlons pas !! Prostitution !! Drogue...  Pas une goute d’eau chaude.. Pas de service de petit déjeuner pour cause de jour férié !! Personnel en congés !!  Insonorisation 1er Prix et travaux à partir de 8:00 du matin !! Une Catastrophe   Seul point positif la literie.

Partamos por la recepción, nada que decir muy buena recepción. Cosas buenas: -Aire acondicionado  -Tv Cable Wifi -Útiles de aseo   Cosas malas: -No contaba con agua caliente. -Estaba llena de pulgas,bichitos pequeños y baratas gigantes. -Se sentía todo el ruido externo de los autos y autobuses. -Las ventanas estaban sucias, pero de esa suciedad que ni con lluvia sale. Todo esto por US 22,50. Gracias.

nos hospedamos con mi pareja en enero de 2016 por 2 noches, las habitacion era simple pero comoda, solo que nos dieron una habitacion que no tenia agua caliente :S lo chequeamos con el conserje y no habian mas disponibles.Lo bueno que aceptaban tarjeta.

direccion: Urdesa Central. Balsamos Sur #308, Guayaquil EQ09112 Ecuador
descripcion: We offer affordable accommodation for backpackers and travelers who enjoy a chill, peaceful and cosy place to stay in while in the city chaos. Our facilities are design to offer a friendly atmosphere where you'll feel like home. Having lots of common areas to invite all of you to feel like part of our family. Nucapacha is in Urdesa Central, a safe and quiet neighborhood, yet close to bars, restaurants, night clubs, banks and more.

comentarios.p_comentario: The hostel is nice and comfortable and - what made it very special for me - the people (the owner as well as the volunteers) are just amazingly friendly and helpful. I stayed their three times during my entire trip and I really felt like coming home. Apart from several activities like free walking tours and yoga, they also offer very good vegan food in their café. I do highly recommend.

Buen sitio para quedarse , limpio y tranquilo, aunque pongo una reseña que creo que deben añadir y es los carteles informando en castellano no solo en inglés ya que es el idioma de Ecuador , creo que es una falta de respeto

I really enjoyed my stay at this hostel. The staff was very friendly and helpful, the atmosphere was very chilled and the pool was definitely a bonus in the hot and humid weather! There was a good mixture of people too (including solo travellers of different ages). The area felt safe too when walking in the neighbourhood. I definitely recommend it.

I loved this hostel, it felt like home. The staff was very helpful, it was a bit of a complicated situations with the road blocks but we managed to organize something with their help. Would definitely come back here if I ever go to Guayaquil again.

We stayed at Nucapacha for a few nights, we had a wonderful stay! The guest kitchen and the pool are definitely really nice to have! Breakfast was good and the staff was super friendly! We were there during a huge strike affecting the whole country. It was very hard to get around as the roads were blocked and no buses were running. The staff went above and beyond to help us get to the coast, they were even in touch with the taxi driver as we were on our way, and made sure we got to the coast safe and sound.  Thanks for being so considerate, friendly and helpful guys, we really enjoyed our stay!

We loved our stay here. Rooms were clean and nice. Hostel itself was nice with friendly staff. Kitchen was great, everything we needed and most of all super clean. When we were there werent allot of people. We could imagine it could be a very nice place around the pool with everybody

Staff was nice and very helpful, you can enjoy the swimming pool and relax.  There is a slack line over the pool. Free walking tour starts from this hostel. A guy was snoring in the dorm, but it's not the fault of the hostel.

Un hostal muy cómodo. Se encuentra cerca del aeropuerto y en una zona muy segura. El personal es muy amable y te ayuda con cualquier necesidad que tengan. El área de la piscina es muy confortable y tiene amacas que son ideales para leer durante la tarde. Dentro del hostal venden varios tipos de cerveza y bebidas frías para pasar el calor. Si no llevas candado te pueden alquilar uno en recepción. Cuenta con cuartos privados y cuartos compartidos.

Great find, great location, great staff! Needed 3 beds and had them, breakfast was perfectly fine, served quickly, all good. Staff was friendly and helpful. And while during our stay the weather wasn't hot, the pool was still welcome.

30€ la nuitée sans eau chaude dans la douche, piscine froide et cuisine pas propre du tout ! Pour le laundry, ils nous sont rendus le ligne encore mouillé et sans le plié...  a éviter...  30€ la noche sin agua caliente en la ducha, piscina fría y cocina a disposición pero bastante sucia. En el Laundry, nos devolvieron la ropa todavía mojada y sin plegar...

nombre_id: Hoteles en Guayaquil - Suites Guayaquil Cerca del Aeropuerto
direccion: Av. Leopoldo Benitez y Av. Hno. Miguel, Mz 2, V 9, Guayaquil 090102 Ecuador
descripcion: Guayaquil Suites hotel, we offer a space for rest and if business is our location is very privileged is in step Guayaquil airport, bus terminal Guayaquil, Guayaquil Convention Center and Mall del Sol Shopping Center. Hotels Guayaquil Guayaquil hotel has rooms: Type: Double, triple, double and single, all with cable TV, Wi-Fi, air conditioning, free local calls, private bathroom with hot shower, Garage, Safe, Maintenance and Cleaning Daily with room service ,; Spread over 3 floors for your entire comfort. The best memory who will visit Ecuador Guayaquil, is the quality and warmth of its people, kind and honest, with good costumbrestos that will surprise anyone who has the opportunity to treat Hotel in Guayaquil

comentarios.nombreh_id: Hoteles en Guayaquil - Suites Guayaquil Cerca del Aeropuerto
comentarios.p_comentario: It took us a while to find the hotel, because they don't have a sign - they don't need a sign, because once you are a customer, you will come back! / ¡Nos llevó un rato hallar el hotel, porque no tiene rótulo - no les hace falta tener un letrero, porque una vez que uno se haya hospedado allá, ¡querrá siempre regresar!

comentarios.nombreh_id: Hoteles en Guayaquil - Suites Guayaquil Cerca del Aeropuerto
comentarios.p_comentario: Buen sitio, limpio y ordenado. Unicamente se debería incluir el desayuno en la tarifa, ya que el precio se encuentra en un rango medio donde se deberían incluir todos los servicios. Por lo demás, muy bueno.

comentarios.nombreh_id: Hoteles en Guayaquil - Suites Guayaquil Cerca del Aeropuerto
comentarios.p_comentario: Je me suis arrêtée 2 fois passer la nuit dans cet hotel en juin ,je ne peux que féliciter les propriétaires . Depuis la Recepcion à l'aéroport jusqu'à celle de la chambre ,on ressent la gentillesse,un excellent service . En plus la proximité de l'aéroport et un tarif très accessible font l'attrait de cette escale que je recommande vivement.

comentarios.nombreh_id: Hoteles en Guayaquil - Suites Guayaquil Cerca del Aeropuerto
comentarios.p_comentario: I booked a room here last week. Everything went smoothly the girls that worked at the hotel were very friendly and nice, the price was good and the service excellent will totally return. and it is also near the airport and mall del sol

comentarios.nombreh_id: Hoteles en Guayaquil - Suites Guayaquil Cerca del Aeropuerto
comentarios.p_comentario: Acogedor, limpio con muy buena atención, muy buena opción a precio accesible, en todo lo que solicitábamos nos daban solución inmediata, el aire acondicionado no enfriaba tanto como esperábamos, pero estuvo bien, deberían colocar un letrero porque no podíamos llegar al lugar

comentarios.nombreh_id: Hoteles en Guayaquil - Suites Guayaquil Cerca del Aeropuerto
comentarios.p_comentario: My young daughter left a small box (the size of a paperback book) with 3 cassette tapes of books we had borrowed from the library. After confirming that they had found the box in our room, I asked them to send it to me. I have not heard back from them since, even after 5 attempts.  Of course, I have offered to pay all shipping fees and more, but still no response.  Since the cassettes were borrowed from the library, I now owe the library $180 because they will not send me the box.  I am so angry and frustrated!!!

comentarios.nombreh_id: Hoteles en Guayaquil - Suites Guayaquil Cerca del Aeropuerto
comentarios.p_comentario: Localizado em avenida que te permite a pé chegar em bom shopping e serviços como banco, café e lojas  Instalações acanhadas mas limpas, recepção limitada mas com pessoas atenciosas. Se for para dormir está bem como os preços de hospedge é alto, seguem esse nível considero um a duas estrelas a um custo é de 40 dólares

comentarios.nombreh_id: Hoteles en Guayaquil - Suites Guayaquil Cerca del Aeropuerto
comentarios.p_comentario: Me gusto bastante el hotel: limpio, silencioso, cómodo, seguro... en fin fue una buena opción al visitar Guayaquil. La ubicación es un plus muy importante, esta muy cerca del aeropuerto, el terminal terrestre, del mall del sol y el café de Tere (si se quiere comer medio añiñado), sino en las cuadras aledañas hay unas huecas bastante buenas. El hotel además ofrece un precio bastante cómodo, hay que considerar que la mayoría de hoteles cercanos al aeropuerto son más grandes y conocidos, pero también más caros. El único inconveniente que tuve fue que no me dieron desayuno, a pesar de que ya me lo habían ofrecido por teléfono cuando reserve, tal vez sería mejor confirmar con un mail. Pero a parte de ello, buena atención y muy recomendable.

comentarios.nombreh_id: Hoteles en Guayaquil - Suites Guayaquil Cerca del Aeropuerto
comentarios.p_comentario: I stayed at Suites Guayaquil because I had a 6 am flight out.  My room was very clean, a full bath with shower.  I was surprised at the stairs to get to my room, but received help from the desk attendant.  Good value for the price.

comentarios.nombreh_id: Hoteles en Guayaquil - Suites Guayaquil Cerca del Aeropuerto
comentarios.p_comentario: Trás el Mall del Sol a dos cuadras del Café de Tere. Habitación grande y cómoda, me pareció muy limpio, Tv con cable. Me pareció una interesante alternativa para alojarse en Guayaquil. Regresaré sin duda

direccion: Aguirre 603 y Escobedo Esq., Guayaquil 090150 Ecuador
descripcion: Hotel Sol de Oriente is most recognized for its oriental style. Has 56 rooms, TV Cable, Internet Wirelles, Security Box, Cafeteria, Business Center, Valet Parking,Airport Shutle. All of which make Hotel Sol de Oriente the perfect place for business travelers, tourists and more.

comentarios.p_comentario: Nos hemos alojado en este hotel principalmente por su ubicación y porque tenía parking…. Pero el parking es únicamente nocturno (de 7pm a 6am cuesta 4 dólares). En nuestro caso nos dejaron meter el coche desde las 6 pm de un sábado hasta las 11:30am del domingo, pero porque era domingo… entre semana no es así. Esto es una gran pega si vas con coche porque cuesta encontrar dónde aparcar en la calle (es pleno centro y no siempre es fácil) o hay que pagar un parking (hay uno justo al lado del hotel que cuesta 1,50 dólares la hora). El hotel es bastante amplio (tiene 10 pisos aprox), tiene restaurante (no lo probamos) y habitaciones bastante amplias y limpias (aunque con una decoración un poco desfasada) y con aire acondicionado. El baño también es bastante amplio y el agua caliente funcionaba muy bien (aunque se salía el agua y se inundaba un poco todo…). El wifi en la habitación funcionaba bastante mal… (iba y venía). En resumen, es una opción que debería mejorar, pero es verdad que para el precio es cómodo, amplio y muy bien situado junto a la catedral.…

Buena ubicación,habitación amplia,pero era interior,sin ventana al exterior,oscura muy vieja y sucia. Cama muy incómoda también.Pintar igual no es barato pero oye una limpieza exhausta,eliminar el moho de los azulejos del baño...Quitar los cuadros torcidos..

El  servicio del hotel es bueno , me parece muy buena ubicación ya que el malecon 2000 esta a unos 10 minutos , lo único que me molesto fue que salí a divertirme y regrese en la madrugada y las personas que estaban de turno me miraron feo , se suponía que no importaba la hora de llegada , el resto si fue muy bueno .

Perfettamente ubicato nell'area di mio interesse (l'asse Cattedrale / Malecon); silenzioso, obsoleto tutto quello che si vuole, ma dal prezzo bassissimo che giustifica quasi tutto. Gentilissimi alla ricezione, assolutamente inadeguato il servizio alle camere, sempre bene al ristorante. Le 4 stelle sono in realtà 2

Es un hotel que esta descuidado. Las cortinas de la habitacion estaban rotas. La atencion de Las recepcionistas es terrible porque no saben tratar decentemente al cliente. La variedad de la comida es bastante limitada y Las instalaciones son feas, viejas y mal mantenidas. No volveria jamas a Este Lugar. Es Caro para el pesimo servicio que brindar. NO recomiendo Este Lugar. Fue una experiencia fea.

Persoal super amigable, buena ubicacion del hotel, las habitacion en la que estuve comoda aunque el baño deja mucho q decir, falta de aseo remodelacion la bañera muy vieja el lavamanos inestable (peligroso), ventanas y espejos sucios.

Ubicacido en el centro de la ciudad, las habitaciones son espaciosas, pero estan algo anticuadas. El servicio de recepcion muy atento y cordial, pero no tienen ni unna botella de de agua para venderte¡¡¡ El desayuno empezaba a las 7.... pero realmente fue a las 7,30. El comedor necesita una nueva decoracion.... Se ha quedado obsoleto¡¡¡

Un hotel ubicado en pleno centro de la ciudad, las habitaciones son cómodas, cuentan con aire acondicionado, ducha con agua caliente, tv por cable, sin embargo el desayuno incluido es promedio, tipo americano, sin nada que resalte, tuvimos un problema con la habitación y nos dieron una pronta y amable solución. Recomendado para viajes de negocios.

Estuve hace una semana aproximadamente en este hotel. La habitación era bastante amplia y acogedora. Pero para bañarte solo te brindan shampoo, sin acondicionador. Al desayuno le pondría unos 5 ptos, es pan de pancho con huevos revueltos y si pedís te dan mermelada o manteca. No había te . Elpersonal estaba colapsado, al menos cuando nosotros fuimos, es decir que hacían lo que podían. La atención de la recepción podría ser mejor.

Muy buen servicio y excelente trato simplemente es el mejor de guayaquil siempre es gusto quedarme hay disfrutar de una acogedora estadía y muy amables con los clientes y siempre están dispuestos ayudar y servir

direccion: Cedros Sur 107 y Victor Emilio Estrada, Guayaquil 090150 Ecuador
descripcion: We offer spacious rooms and suites that are designed to fit anyone's budget and taste. Each room offers you free access to Wi-Fi since we know you need some of the pleasures from back home. We know you'll enjoy your stay with us, we even guarantee it.

comentarios.p_comentario: The hotel is in no conditions to be open. Pool full of mosquitoes and floating insects and cold water( they say is heated). The door in the room badly closes. Didn’t feel say leaving my luggage. Humidity in the room from the water from the jacuzzi. The hand held shower head bottom part comes off and you can see under the jacuzzi. Mosquitoes come in through ther. The jacuzzi has nasty stains on it. You don’t want to lay there believe me. I told the lady at the front which is the only person helping the guests about my room being full is mosquitoes and she went in there with a spray bottle of Raid and sprayed the whole room with it. Including the bed and my luggage with all my clothes. She then told me it was ready. I went to the bar and no one was there so I went to the front desk and ask the lady there and she said she does the bar too but doesn’t know how to make a drink so she gave me a beer. The beer was hot so at that point I realized they don’t care about their guest, these people just want to take your money. I slept with a towel over my head and still got eaten by the mosquitoes in my room. I have pictures and I’m sending them here but they don’t appear on the reviews sadly. If you go to Booking.com and you scroll all the way down you will find all the hidden reviews from the people that had complaints. After the first night I told them I was going somewhere else. They try showing me another room but I said no. I didn’t want to spend my vacation like that, that’s not a vacation. So Fatima and the other girl at the front desk told me the money was going to take a week to hit my account. Supposedly I was going to get the money back for 3 or 4 days. They said I was only going to be charge 2 days even though I only stay one. Which I was okay with because I just wanted to get out of there. After a month went by I spoke to them and since then they have try to ask me for my PayPal, my passport, my bank account, etc. without returning me the said money. At this point they ask if I knew someone in Ecuador with a bank account to try to return the money but nothing. The only bad experience I had in Ecuador was at Cedros Inn biggest thiefs with the biggest smile because they are straight liars. I’m still waiting for my money and had to pay to stay somewhere else. That was back in February. Please don’t make the mistake to go there. These platforms should do an assessment on the hotel before promoting it. Because it is announced and promoted as 4 starts and that place is falling  apart. Terrible experience. Help bring awareness if you stayed here. Trying to upload pictures but it doesn’t work. Here is my personal email if you guys need proof. elcami1000@icloud.com…

EL PEOR TRATO QUE LE PUEDEN DAR A LOS HUÉSPEDES! Tuvimos un problema con una chapa dañada. La puerta del baño de la habitación se cerraba con seguro sola, llamamos para que la abran, el señor que vino a abrirla totalmente falta de educación y altanero dijo que no la volviéramos a cerrar porque no la iba abrir una segunda vez. La puerta se volvió a cerrar nuevamente sola con seguro y tuvimos que volver a llamar a recepción. Esta vez vino una señora de recepción molesta, altanera, acusándonos de haberla cerrado a propósito. (Como si no tuviéramos nada mejor que hacer dentro de la Habitación ) después de discutir conmigo, no consiguió abrir la puerta tuvieron que llamar al mismo que siempre la abre, entonces es sobre entendido que este es un problema recurrente en esta habitación, porque ya cuentan con quien sabe abrir la puerta y con la herramienta que usan para ello. Y no solo eso,   afuera en el area social, hay música súper alta sin importarles la tranquilidad de los huéspedes. NUCA vengan si quieren tranquilidad y buen trato. …

Hotel que usan sabanas sucias, me pico un cien pies en la cama, el cafe que usan es instantáneo el mas barato que hay, cubiertos sucios, quien te cocina y sirve el desayuno es la señora que limpia, usan champú usados marca sedal, la bulla es fuerte, los fines de semana entran hombres y mujeres raras y se ponen a beber licor y hacer bulla, el agua caliente no se puede calibrar, ofrecen cócteles y nunca tienen nada  solo rescato el personal de recepcion muy amables

El hotel es bonito, acogedor, y pequeño.  Pero carece de opciones para desayunar, le falta mejorar la atención al cliente.  Sería importante que para el desayuno sean un poco más innovadores.  Por otro lado las toallas pueden ser más suavecitas si usan suavitel y hay que mejorar el servicio de lavandería.  Gracias

Instalaciones bonitas. Decoracion sencilla. Habitaciones cómodas y baño limpio con buenos amenities. Desayuno incluido en la tarifa. Podría mejorar. Fátima la srta. Recepcionista muy agradable y profesional.

The hotel is well located, close to banks, restaurants and transportation. It is clean and familiar. The staff is friendly and helpful. It has basic ammenities, the rooms are neat and well organized. Wi-fi available

We got room nr.101 and the room door was right in to the reception, and it was noisy til midnight. Fair enough. The worst of it all was that the hotel had guest from the Jehova's witnesses, they came to our door at 6am in the morning to wake us up. The rest of the stay was good and the staff was helpful. Free water, tea and coffee. The breakfast was not included. Bread and jam or cornflakes ($10). Not too exciting.

We had an enjoyable weekend in this comfortable hotel - the swimming pool was an added bonus.  The staff were helpful and the location was excellent for our needs.  The lobby area was inviting and the hotel provides books and magazines for the enjoyment of the guests.

Pasamos una noche en el Cedros inn camino a galapagos. Es una muy buena opción para familias. Nosotros somos 5 y cuesta mucho encontrar habitaciones familiares. Esta habitación es cómoda y amplia para 5, y a un buen precio. El lugar es limpio, tiene aire acondicionado (muy necesario en este clima) y la gente es amable. El único detalle es que las 3 camas de los niños están en un altillo en la habitación al que hay que subir por una escalera como de bote, muy empinada y estrecha, para mi gusto, no apta para niños menores de 10 años o adultos con sobrepeso.

Angenehme Atmosphäre. Zimmer etwas beengt aber renoviert und sauber. Sehr freundliches Personal. Frühstück lieber weglassen und um die Ecke an der Hauptstraße essen. Viele Restaurants in der Nähe. Für mich aber insgesamt zu abgelegenen

direccion: Av. Francisco De Orellana 236, Guayaquil 090150 Ecuador

comentarios.p_comentario: Un hotel muy seguro, limpio y con excelente servicio. Tanto en recepción, room services, comedor y ayuda en sistemas de información fueron muy atentos y serviciales. Además el servicio de transportación (taxis del hotel) excelente. Victor y su equipo fueron siempre puntuales, respetuosos y sobre todo su excelencia en sus servicios.  altamente recomendado.

Again, this is a favorite resting spot on my journeys. There have been many cosmetic improvements since my previous stay (pre-pandemic), but the staff has maintained their quality and attentiveness. Jorge Buchel (GM) and Kevin Velasquez (Front Office) run a tight ship. They have ensured that ALL staff are responsive and focused on Marriott quality. This hotel is a gem! Any traveler will be well received and accommodated at this jewel of a Marriott. Happy stay!

A group of colleagues and doctoral college students stayed for a whole week at the Courtyard Guayaquil for an international congress. We felt at home, safe, and pampered. Their service was outstanding.  Also, their Taxi company called Amador tour and Grupo AT Taxi Seguro was the cherry on top. Those drivers are highly professional, knowledgeable, respectful, and responsible… they make you feel at home… safe! A group member lost her phone in one of their cars (Pepe’s Car… the best), and he found it, returned to the hotel, and gave it back to the owner. Nowadays, this kind of Taxi driver are very hard to find… they are  GOLD, and they complement the excellent experience our group had at the hotel.

For a Courtyard Marriott International, and the price you pay to stay at hotels like it, you are expecting a standard to be followed. My partner and I found our bathroom not cleaned and with no shower or hand towels. Had she not been a Bonvoy Member, we most likely may have not received any. There is a relatively small pool for a 16 floor building, on the roof. The staff is friendly, and the location is next to the San Marino Mall, which is ideal for shopping. There is a delicious 5/5 restaurant in the lobby called the Novo.  Hoping our next visit is a much better experience.

Excellent service. Extraordinary attention from all the staff members.  The manager Kevin Velasquez was extremely helpful in every detail of my party as well as the party coordinator in the hotel. I am deeply thankful for the way my entire family and friends were treated not just at the hotel but as well at the night of my birthday party.  Esther C

We had the best possible stay at the Guayaquil Courtyard. Our trip was a mixed family and business trip, and having been less than satisfied lately with our previous go-to hotel in Guayaquil, we decided to give this one a try, and are very happy we did. We spend a lot of time at the hotel and can say the rooms were comfortable, the food is good, the staff is friendly and accommodating, the rooftop pool and gym were useful to us and we have zero complaints.

Our room is on the 6th floor and the “Club/bar” is on the 5th floor right below our room.  Music is is so loud at the bar and doesn’t turn off until 3am. We can hear every word of every song. When your trying to get a peaceful nights rest this is not where you will find it!! We called the front desk and they could not move us and were not able to have the bar turn the music down.  Very disappointed that the Marriott would allow for a bar to play music that loud and keep their guests up all night!!  It’s one thing to have music blaring until 11pm but not until 3am!!  Unbelievable!! 👎🏼👎🏼

Was only here a night during my stopover transit in Guayaquil. They have a complimentary airport shuttle, room was great, good WiFi, good food. Very close to the airport. Didn't really get to explore anything in the hotel or nearby, but it seemed like a busy part of town

I stayed here for a family reunion. It is convenient and reliable. front desk people are very helpful, Andres was attentive. Rooms are good, wifi works good. Restaurant was amazing fresh juices, authentic food. Service was nice. Plenty of good choices within walking distance. Overall it surpassed my expectations. Highly Recommend.

Upon my arrival the hotel front desk staff welcomed me with a smile and was ready to assist me with the checking process, Jose front desk representative was very profesional with my check out and helpful. Daniela from the restaurant staff was very nice always ready to provided guidelines with the menu and a beautiful smile.  Thank you Courtyard by Marriott in Guayaquil, Ecuador

direccion: Junin 412 Y Codova Centro, Guayaquil 090150 Ecuador
descripcion: HDC, Hotel de Centro, strategically located three blocks from the Guayas River, where you will find the wonderful Malecón 2000, which is the most important attraction of Guayaquil city. HDC, offers to their guests executive rooms with private bathroom, air conditioning, television, internet access and breakfast. We have rooms for single, double and triple use. In addition we have an exclusive parking for our guests. HDC is not only convenient for executives who need to be in the center of Guayaquil, but also for all tourists who want to know our beautiful city by walking, because we are close from the most important tourist areas.

comentarios.p_comentario: El personal del hotel fue muy amable y siempre estuvieron dispuestos a ayudarnos. Una noche, necesitaba una botella de agua para tomar una pastilla y no tuvieron ningun problema en traerla a nuestra habitación, a pesar de que era bastante tarde. El hotel se encuentra a dos cuadras del malecón, por lo que era muy fácil movilizarnos.  La habitacion cuenta con aire acondicionado y era bastante comoda. Por lo que sin duda, regresarìamos a este hotel en nuestra próxima visita a Guayaquil.

EL CENTRO RESTO BAR est très bien situé au centre historique de la ville. Après une superbe balade pour admirer les illuminations, on apprécie ce bon restaurant  . A conseiller sans hésiter, vous ne regretterez pas.

I had conducted extensive research prior to selecting a hotel in Guayaquil.  Given the city's - likely somewhat exaggerated - reputation about crime (I am sure it was worse in the past and the reputation persists), it was important to find a hotel in a safe neighborhood.  Additionally, wanted to have easy access to Malecón 2000, which is  Guayaquil's main attraction.  Hotel del Centro proved to be the absolutely right choice for Guayaquil.  Located 3 short blocks from Malecón 2000, it offered every convenience we needed in Guayaquil.  It also had an air conditioning system that worked really well, as Guayaquil can be hot and humid.  The hotel totally exceeded our expectations.  It's also very close to the airport.  While others have commented that it takes 15 minutes to get to the airport, it took us only 5 minutes to get to the airport.  This could possibly be explained by the fact that we went to the airport very early on a Saturday morning.  Since we were leaving this early, we asked if they could give us packaged breakfast and they said they could not, which was fine because the airport had some amazing cafes.  Our room was spacious, as was its bathroom.  Both were very clean, as was the hotel.  The furnishings were not the most luxurious, but they were in good taste, condition, and completely functional.  Check-in and check-out were a breeze.  They were helpful in calling a taxi to the airport.  Overall, the location of Hotel del Centro was excellent.  In terms of its decor and everything else, this hotel exceeded expectations.  Glad to have stayed at Hotel del Centro, and would do it again.…

Abbiamo soggiornato in questo hotel per 2 notti, l'hotel è in una buona posizione a pochi passi dal Malecon 2000, e dalle principali zone turistiche della città. Le camere ed il bagno sono abbastanza nuove e pulite, il personale è molto gentile la colazione è nella media.

I stayed here one night after a Galapagos trip. For the money, I thought this was a great value and would stay here again.  The location is great - easily walkable to the iguana park, and to Malecon 2000. It felt very safe walking back after dinner.  I thought the receptionists were friendly, and we were able to communicate despite my minimal Spanish.  The room were relatively large and the beds were comfortable. It isn't beautifully decorated, but it is functional. The shower was hot. My room was quiet at night. The air conditioner wasn't the strongest, but it did work. The wifi worked very well for me - I was able to watch a movie online.  Breakfast was included at the small cafe next door. I thought it was fine - the food was freshly prepared.

El hotel está trabajando en el buen camino, habitaciones limpias, modernas, agua caliente, desayuno incluido aceptable e inmejorable ubicación para el centro y el malecón. No obstante, la chica de la recepción en la mañana del día martes 06 de agosto fue antipática total, no le da importancia ninguna a la atención al cliente... cuánto tiene que aprender de otros países donde el cliente siempre tiene la razón. Otro punto es que no está bien insonorizado las hab. Es una lástima porque con el ruido de la calle solo pude dormir de 12:00pm a 4:00 am... y uno busca descansar bien como mínimo.

BBB = Bueno, Bonito y Barato.  Una excelente ubicación en pleno centro de la ciudad. La habitación cómoda, amplia y limpia. Una buena cama para dormir. El baño y ducha están bien. Trato amable de la gente que atiende en el hotel. Se incluye el desayuno que es sencillo pero llena el estómago. El valor de la habitación es cómodo.

Excelente servicio, habitaciones muy cómodas, hotel céntrico, a cuadras del malecón 2000, cerca de restaurantes y muy buena atención del personal, cerca de atractivos turísticos por visitar en guayaquil, totalmente recomendable, seguro y con todo lo necesario para tener una gran estadía.

Este hotel està a dos cuadras del malecòn y tiene diversos negocios alrededor. las habitaciones son amplias y limpias y cuentan con todos los servicios bàsicos. El desayuno es super bàsico pero rico. La atenciòn por parte del personal muy buena, especialmente del joven a cargo de recepciòn quien en todo momento se mostrò solìcito para ayudarnos en lo que fuera necesario.

El personal no resultó muy amable. El desayuno arrancaba demasiado tarde, pedimos algo para llevar ya que teníamos un bus a las 8am pero no hubo caso, ni siquiera con eso nos ayudaron. Precio/calidad aceptable.

direccion: Calle Sucre # 203 y Pichincha, Guayaquil 090150 Ecuador
descripcion: Welcome to Hotel Malecon Inn, your Guayaquil “home away from home.” Hotel Malecon Inn aims to make your visit as relaxing and enjoyable as possible, which is why so many guests continue to come back year after year.Given the close proximity of popular landmarks, such as Mirador Bellavista (1.5 mi) and George Capwell Stadium (1.9 mi), guests of Hotel Malecon Inn can easily experience some of Guayaquil's most well known attractions.Guest rooms offer air conditioning, and Hotel Malecon Inn makes getting online easy as free wifi is available.You can also take advantage of some of the amenities offered by the motel, including a 24 hour front desk and baggage storage. In addition, guests can enjoy a fitness center during their visit.During your visit, be sure to check out one of Guayaquil's popular shrimp restaurants such as La Canoa, Caracol Azul, and Lo Nuestro Cafe - Restaurant, all a short distance from Hotel Malecon Inn.During your visit, be sure to check out Parque Historico Guayaquil (0.2 mi), which is a popular attraction within walking distance of the motel.Hotel Malecon Inn puts the best of Guayaquil at your fingertips, making your stay both relaxing and enjoyable.

comentarios.p_comentario: El WiFi es inestable, las luces no funcionan bien, los baños tienen bordes negros en el lavabo, el desayuno no sabe bien, no disponen de un directorio de domicilios. Las habitaciones son amplias, las camas cómodas y la tv es de calidad media

Acabamos de llegar al Hostal Malecón la verdad que me ha sorprendido 😮 totalmente reformado, colchón mucho mejor que en hoteles con más estrellas, baño está bien una ducha amplia, tienes una cocina que te puedes cocinar  y un balcón con vistas al río, nosotros tenemos incluido el desayuno y tenemos que ir mañana a un bar al lado. Tiene wifi una manta a parte por si tienes frío, televisión perchas y una barra para colgar la ropa y secador, totalmente recomendable.

La ubicación es inmejorable a pasos del Malecom 2000 y muy cerca de otros atractivos turísticos de la ciudad mas poblada de Ecuador. Necesita mejoramiento edilicio y de infraestructura. El desayuno lo sirven en forma personal, con calidad humana pero con poca variedad.

Las habitaciones son internas con una ventana al pasillo, sin Black Out, con un olor a humedad espantoso, empeorado por un desodorante inmundo. Cerca de mi habitación debe haber una oficina y solo un teléfono toda la noche, la primera vez que solo se escuchaba tan fuerte que pense que estaba dentro de mi habitación. Durante la noche, una mujer con tacos paso ida y vuelta varias veces hablando y riendo. NO DORMI EN TODA LA NOCHE. El desayuno fue el peor desayuno que tome en mi vida.

Only 2 floors with rooms, the elevator is old And too slow, the smell was super bad The tv was broken, people playing around like 20 kids teens boys and girls in one room, the AC broken, terrible area outside....  never again

El hotel es horrible, dicen tener aire acondicionado y no es cierto... reservé dos habitaciones a una le funcionaba perfecto a la otra solo le servía de ventilador y solo ventilaba (con aire caliente) a una parte pequeña de la habitación, adicional a esto solicite dos habitaciones de una o dos camas y me asignaron dos como de 7 camas cada una y realmente éramos 3 para una y 2 para la otra; la ubicación terrible, no recomendable para la familia más si vas con niños pequeños... no lo recomiendo y no volvería.

Pésimo servicio. Hay que llamar para que arreglen la habitación. Además las habitaciones están en mal estado. En mi habitación faltaban incluso vidrios de la ventana. No controlan a los huéspedes ruidosos y molestos durante la noche sumando el ruido del tráfico en las calles.  Verdaderamente una pocilga impresentable. No dejarse engañar que esto no llega a ninguna categoría de un verdadero hotel. El ascensor viejo y peligroso. En el supuesto gimnasio las máquinas todas dañadas. Los recepcionistas gente impresentable y poco servicial

Guided by reviews here we booked a top room, with spa bath. What we got was a top floor room, partially glazed.  Yes - only half the window frames had glass in.  The temperature in the room was unbearable.  The road noise from the street below even worse.  And as if that wasn't bad enough the bed was more like a hammock, and the sheets didn't fit.  The toilet was set to permanent flush so it ran constantly.  We tried to fill the spa bath and the hot water ran out before we managed that.  The water also went off at 7 am so we couldn't shower before we left. The safe didn't work either. Seriously though - no glass in the windows in an inner city hotel ! You get a single towel and those poor quality little soap bars that no one ever uses.  Dreadful place.  To be fair the staff were nice enough.…

Good enough to stay for the night passing through Guayaquil. Staff was friendly enough and had my laundry done for a few dollars.  It's an older place so expect the feel of that. Everything was clean and comfortable enough to get some sleep.

Rooms were relatively clean and a good size certainly a budget type hotel! Kitchen was quite accommodating and certainly tried to give some variety to a basic breakfast! ! Staff were relatively helpful when we had a complaint about our room and we were able to change our rooms in no time ! David was quite helpful with room change and organizing transport

direccion: Rumichaca 1503, Guayaquil 090150 Ecuador
descripcion: Conveniently located in the Centro de Guayaquil district of Guayaquil, Hotel Berlín is set less than 1 km from Saint Francis Church, a 14-minute walk from Malecon 2000 and 500 metres from Las Iguanas Park. The property is situated 1.

comentarios.p_comentario: Hay por lo menos dos grandes mentiras en los servicios que ofrecen.  La primera es que dicen que hay recepción las 24hs, sin embargo llegamos a las 6 a.m. para dejar nuestro equipaje hasta la hora del check in y nos encontramos al establecimiento con la reja cerrada con llave y sin timbre, por lo que tuvimos que hacer tiempo hasta esa hora. Luego, cuando preguntamos por qué el agua salía fría de la ducha nos dijeron que nuestra habitación (114) no había agua caliente, a pesar de que ofrecen este servicio. Los canales de televisión que se ven decentemente son dos, por lo que la TV por cable que ofrecen es mentira también.  El ruido que viene de la calle es INFERNAL. Colectivos a toda hora, claxons todo el tiempo y una mujer que canta horrible en un negocio de la vereda de enfrente. No volvería nunca y desaliento a cualquiera que quiera quedarse en este lugar.…

Made a booking through booking.com for 2 nights. We were going to arrived by 1am so we contacted them to see if that was fine. They said it wasn't an issue and they will wait for us. On arrival they didn't allow us in and a teenager asked us our names but he couldn't find them in tje book. He said that we had to wait outside until the receptionist wakes up. He knocked the door several times but that person didn't wake up. So we had to leave. It was very scary we didn't know what to do likely the uber driver started calling other hostels to see if they had rooms available until he found one. Please don't trust them they don't care about the guests.

This hotel is a mess, as the whole city. I don’t know if there is any better hotels of the same price range but seems like there are not so many options. The hotel is situated on a very busy street so you’ll have to listen cars and buses beeping all night long, and trust me, this is hell. When I’ve read the first review, I thought, ok, rooms are clean, and noise... I can deal with it. But it’s very loud. I wasn’t able to hear TV which is in the room. Wi-Fi is only in the main area near reception. Room is big, but so dirty, walls are in stains, window is ugly, with broken parts so I was afraid that after next bus (when even bed starts trembling) they will fall out. Also room has a ceiling fan. Towel, soap, paper and even shampoo tester are provided. But bathroom is so old. And dirty. And there is only cold water. Although it is not far from the center.…

We only stayed for one night, close to downtown 15 min walking. We took a double with private bathroom and air con for less than $15. The room comes with cable TV, bathroom ( w/ soap/toilet paper) and air con but unfortunately our room was on the main street and was super noisy (like sleeping in the street literary).   The good side, it's clean and safe, staff are nice and close to everything.

direccion: José de Antepara 514 entre Padre Solano y Luis Urdaneta, Guayaquil 090150 Ecuador
descripcion: Finding an ideal budget friendly small hotel in Guayaquil does not have to be difficult. Welcome to Hotel Onix Gold, a nice option for travelers like you.Close to some of Guayaquil's most popular landmarks, such as Iglesia San Francisco (0.7 mi) and Captain Morgan's Pirate Ship (0.9 mi), Hotel Onix Gold is a great destination for tourists.Hotel Onix Gold offers guests an array of room amenities including air conditioning, and getting online is possible, as free wifi is available.The small hotel offers a 24 hour front desk, room service, and a concierge, to make your visit even more pleasant. The property also features a lounge. Guests arriving by vehicle have access to street parking.During your visit, be sure to check out a popular Guayaquil lobster restaurant such as Lo Nuestro Cafe - Restaurant, which is a short distance from Hotel Onix Gold.There is no shortage of things to do in the area: explore popular parks such as Parque de la Kennedy, Parque Seminario, and Parque Samanes.Hotel Onix Gold looks forward to welcoming you on your visit to Guayaquil.

comentarios.p_comentario: La atención del personal en general fue muy buena, estuvieron siempre dispuestos a ayudarnos. En cuanto al hotel simplemente se trata de un lugar de paso, no lo recomiendo para ir en pareja, es lúgubre y decadente, además se encuentra en un lugar MUY Peligroso y sobre todo MUY RUIDOSO Y SUCIO de la ciudad, no es posible descansar, ni dormir bien ya que siempre hay buses viejos cerca pitando todo el tiempo. Al salir te encuentras con indigentes y vendedores ambulantes que dan la impresión de que te van a asaltar. Hay que tener mucho cuidado. Si su plan es descansar y pasar un buen tiempo en pareja, no pierda su tiempo y su dinero. Como consejo podrá encontrar en la ciudad opciones muchísimo mejores al mismo precio. De nuevo para destacar lo único bueno fue la atención del personal. La administradora fue excepcionalmente amable y nos ayudo a ubicarnos en otro hotel en Salinas (Marvento 2) de los mismos propietarios pero diametralmente diferente. …

El hotel es muy limpio, agradable y la atención fue muy amable; pero el sector es peligroso, debes tener cuidado y solicitar taxi antes de salir. Las habitaciones tienen todos los servicios, incluso si necesitas toallas extras. El parqueadero es estrecho.

direccion: Km 67 Autopista Naranjito Bucay, Guayaquil 090150 Ecuador
descripcion: Hacienda La Danesa is a traditional dairy and cacao farm with over 145 years of rich heritage and history, located about an hour drive from Guayaquil, Ecuador. Family-owned and managed by the third generation Olsen family, the farm o ers a unique selection of tailor-made activities for guests, including horseback riding trails, hands-on artisan chocolate making and other hacienda-related programs.

comentarios.p_comentario: Siendo una hacienda con todo tipo de animales y espacios verdes grandes , que no permitan el ingreso de mascotas que ahora son parte de una familia, es poco que desear de una experiencia turística al aire libre . Ojalá  que con un ministro de turismo activo , tome en consideración esta sugerencia de mantener una política pet friendly

We found a family atmosphere but also spontaneous, attentive, and diligent teamwork on the part of each person in charge of the services. They always accommodated our requests and took the initiative to keep an eye on our comfort. Our stay was full of details from the staff in who we noticed their desire to serve and please us as if we were part of their family. We remember all of them with gratitude and affection: Yesenia, Saray, Ivonne, Josue, Diego, and all the rest, who attended us during meals, as well as the cooks.

Everything about Hacienda La Danesa was fantastic. The moment you pull into the teak lined driveway which takes 5 minutes to drive, you know you are at somewhere special. The lodge only has limited rooms and ours was appointed wonderfully. The staff was a delight.   We will be back.

Para nosotros el vsitar La Danesa significaba encontrarnos con la naturaleza y un entorno muy natural y la expectativa superó la realidad ya que estuvimos rodeados de naturaleza en su máxima expresión. Un lugar para estar solo, en pareja o en familia, se llegará a encontrar esa paz interior desde que se pone el primer pie en esta Hacienda. Nuestro aniversario de bodas lo celebramos aquí y fue una excelente elección. Muchas gracias, adelante

I was flying from Galápagos Islands back to the USA and had one day to spare in Guayaquil. The city was not the safest place to spend that day and I decided to go to the countryside. In the morning I texted on WhatsApp with Hacienda La Danesa contact person and a very welcoming coordinator arrange an afternoon airport pick up for me, booked a room and explained that cacao tour, river tubing, chocolate making experience and breakfast are included in the rate. The experience was beyond amazing, my stable room was a pure luxury and I was welcomed by a personal host Yvonne with deep care, she made my stay amazing beyond my expectations! The cacao plantation experience was so interesting, I’ve never seen anything like that before. If anyone wants to see true Ecuador, Hacienda La Danesa is a must-visit place!…

Realmente es un lugar maravilloso, sin duda alguna volvería, el paseo por el río fue de lujo, el recorrido en bicicleta ,estupendo.  El personal muy amable en todo momento, definitivamente un lugar para pasarla bien .

This was our second stay at Hacienda La Danesa, our first stay was 3 years ago. However, this time we decided to bring the parents-in-law as well. We were pleased to find La Danesa to be just as charming as the first time. We had reserved the restored stables for us and the garden cottage for the in-laws, both rooms have their own charm. We prefer the restored stables because of the airy but rustic design, views, and the alfresco shower. However, the garden cottage has a beautiful pathway where you can set up a private and very romantic dinner. The team actually set up a beautiful dinner there for us and it was unforgettable.  As for activities, we did beekeeping, horseriding, the cacao experience, and milking in the garden. We would recommend all of them! When we booked the beekeeping experience the beekeeper couldn't make it as he was ill but the team managed to provide a quick solution by having a local beekeeper give us the tour instead.  The food at La Danesa is amazing. All meals are a la carte with only a few options but less is more and the quality and presentation are amazing. The only thing we missed during our stay was great coffee and we would recommend investing in barista training to take the experience to the next level.   At La Danesa the attention to detail is outstanding, both when it comes to the design of the spaces and the experience as a whole. To conclude, La Danesa is a must and it can not be missed.…

From the very first minute we stepped on the immaculate property the staff were amazing. They met every need and were so pleasant and knowledgable. The accomodation was spotless and the home grown food was inventive, pretty and of course delicious! The scope of activities is amazing, but we also enjoyed the relaxing days where you can hear the horses and see vast amount of different birds stroll by your room. Overall an amazing and unique stay!

La Danesa me encanta. 10/10 en toda la experiencia. Relax total. En parejas o en familia. La experiencia del tubing es maravillosa en Río de invierno de cálidas y mansas aguas. Conocer el cacao y sus productos es muy bueno, siendo el de mejor sabor. Las habitaciones son un sueño.

La Hacienda es preciosa, cuidado hasta el último detalle de decoración para lograr un lugar cálido, acogedor a donde la naturaleza está en su maximo esplendor. La habitación es de lujo, muy cómoda, las sabanas y toallas de excelente calidad. Y el servicio estupendo! Cada una de las personas que trabajan en la Danesa son profesionales, educados, atentos. Fue una estadía perfecta
